programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John thinks he's found the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia: a vintage doll in a white dress. But one terrible night, devil worshippers invade their home and try to summon a demon, turning the doll into a conduit for ultimate evil.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: It's been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. She now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Illinois, but this time, Laurie's ready for him.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Wolf Man
programme.desc: Attacked by an unseen animal, Blake and his family barricade themselves inside a farmhouse as the creature prowls the perimeter. As the night stretches on, however, he begins to behave strangely, transforming into something unrecognizable.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: The Nun
programme.desc: When a young nun at a cloistered abbey in Romania takes her own life, a priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate. Together, they uncover the order's unholy secret. Risking not only their lives but their faith and their very souls, they confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: Vacation turns disaster when Kyle and her friends escape a plane crash in the desolate Louisiana everglades, only to discover there's something more dangerous lurking in the shallows.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: John thinks he's found the perfect gift for his expectant wife, Mia: a vintage doll in a white dress. But one terrible night, devil worshippers invade their home and try to summon a demon, turning the doll into a conduit for ultimate evil.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Now that Chris and his girlfriend, Rose, have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, she invites him for a weekend getaway upstate with her parents, Missy and Dean. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behaviour as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries leads him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

programme.title: The Collector
programme.desc: Bank clerk Freddie graduates from collecting butterflies to collecting girls. Only one girl can match wits with him. This quietly chilling film is based on the novel by John Fowles.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Haunting of the Queen Mary
programme.desc: Mysterious and violent incidents occur during a family's 1938 cruise aboard the RMS Queen Mary. These events strangely connect to another family's fate on the same ocean liner in the present.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: I Don't Understand You
programme.desc: Stranded in rural Italy, an American couple on the verge of adopting tries to reconnect during a disastrous holiday.

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: Reuniting after the tragic death of their friend, four college friends set out to hike through the Scandinavian wilderness. But a wrong turn leads them into the mysterious forests of Norse legend, where an ancient evil stalks them at every turn.

programme.title: Gator Creek
programme.desc: Vacation turns disaster when Kyle and her friends escape a plane crash in the desolate Louisiana everglades, only to discover there's something more dangerous lurking in the shallows.

programme.title: Afraid
programme.desc: Curtis and his family are selected to test a revolutionary new device called AIA that takes smart homes to the next level. As AIA begins to learn everyone's behaviour and anticipate their needs, it makes sure nothing and no one gets in their way.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: Presence
programme.desc: A family becomes convinced they are not alone after moving into their new home in the suburbs.

programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: Now that Chris and his girlfriend, Rose, have reached the meet-the-parents milestone of dating, she invites him for a weekend getaway upstate with her parents, Missy and Dean. At first, Chris reads the family's overly accommodating behaviour as nervous attempts to deal with their daughter's interracial relationship, but as the weekend progresses, a series of increasingly disturbing discoveries leads him to a truth that he never could have imagined.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8 mm `snuff' films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: Ma
programme.desc: A lonely middle-aged woman befriends some teenagers and decides to let them party at her house. Just when the kids think their luck couldn't get any better, things start happening that make them question the intention of their host.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: I Don't Understand You
programme.desc: Stranded in rural Italy, an American couple on the verge of adopting tries to reconnect during a disastrous holiday.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: Ma

programme.title: Us
programme.desc: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen. Her worst fears soon become a reality when four masked strangers descend upon the house, forcing the Wilsons into a fight for survival. When the masks come off, the family is horrified to learn that each attacker takes the appearance of one of them.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Super High Roller (SHR)-The €100,000 Super High Roller reaches its climactic finale with six elite players vying for nearly €1.4 million. Leading the pack is 2015 Monte Carlo Main Event champion Adrian Mateos, facing off against poker heavyweights Mikita Badziakouski, László Bujtas, and Marius Gierse, plus wildcards Kent Staahle and Mikalai Vaskaboinikau. With life-changing money on the line, who will claim the prestigious title?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 1 (ME1)-After a three-year hiatus, the prestigious EPT Monte Carlo €5,000 Main Event returns in spectacular fashion. Day 2 brings together poker's biggest names, including high-stakes specialist Patrik Antonius, World Champion Koray Aldemir, Italian ace Mustapha Kanit, and trailblazing two-time EPT champion Victoria Coren-Mitchell. The battle for poker immortality begins.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 2 (ME2)-Tension mounts as the money bubble approaches in Monte Carlo's Main Event. With 159 players set to cash for at least €8,690, every decision matters. EPT legends Patrik Antonius and Davidi Kitai command the feature table while 2019 PSPC champion Ramon Colillas holds the chip lead. Who will survive the bubble and who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 3 (ME3)-The money bubble has burst, but for seasoned pro Ole Schemion-who has earned over $5 million in Monte Carlo alone-a minimum cash isn't enough. He faces a formidable challenge from French star Gaëlle Baumann and online legend Jussi Nevanlinna at the feature table. With real money now guaranteed, the gloves come off.

programme.title: Up & Adams
programme.desc: Kay Adams and a rotating roster of current and former players discuss the biggest storylines in the NFL.

programme.title: Run It Back
programme.desc: Michelle Beadle, Chandler Parsons and Lou Williams discuss the biggest NBA games, matchups and storylines from around the league.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 4 (ME4)-PSPC champion Ramon Colillas surges into the top five as just 40 players remain in the EPT Monte Carlo Main Event. Day 3 intensifies as competitors battle to reach the final two tables. With the finish line in sight, who has what it takes to keep their championship dreams alive?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 5 (ME5)-The field narrows to just 16 survivors, including EPT Dublin champion Niall Farrell and PSPC winner Ramon Colillas. With over €41,000 already locked up, the stakes couldn't be higher as players fight for their place at the final table of nine. Every hand could be the difference between glory and heartbreak.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 6 (ME6)-Nine players remain, but only six will advance to the final day with a shot at nearly €1 million and poker immortality. Can PSPC champion Ramon Colillas extend his remarkable run to another major final table, or will his epic journey end just short of the ultimate prize?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 7 (ME7)-The moment of truth arrives at the EPT Monte Carlo final table. Six players-two businessmen, one qualifier, and three seasoned professionals-wage the ultimate battle for almost €1 million and the coveted EPT trophy. After days of intense competition, only one can claim poker's most prestigious prize.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: Shuffle up and deal! The biggest $25k buy-in poker tournament in history sees more than 1,000 players - amateurs, pros and sports stars - come to the Bahamas to compete for a first prize of more than $5m.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: NBA star Paul Pierce and UFC announcer Bruce Buffer are among the celebrities taking to the poker tables in the Bahamas, as Day 1 of the biggest High Roller tournament in history continues.

programme.title: The Price Is Right
programme.desc: "Come on down!" "The Price Is Right" -- hosted by Bob Barker until 2007 and Drew Carey thereafter -- features a wide variety of games and contests with the same basic challenge: Guess the prices of everyday (or not-quite-everyday) retail items. Four contestants, all of whom are seated in one of the wildest audiences in daytime game-show history, are called to the stage to play a preliminary pricing round. That winner joins the host on stage for one of more than 70 different pricing games. After three such games, the contestants spin a big wheel -- hoping to get as close to $1 as possible -- in the "Showcase Showdown." The two highest winners of that round advance to the final, where prizes could be cars or roomsful of furniture. A trio of models presents the prizes.

programme.title: Match Game
programme.desc: Gene Rayburn hosts this comedy-game show hybrid in which contestants try to match answers given by celebrities to humorous, and often risque, fill-in-the-blank questions. The contestant with the most points at the end of the game advances to play the bonus round, in which the contestant has a chance to win thousands of dollars, with the actual amount dependent on the rules in place at the time of the episode.

The contestant with the most points at the end of the game advances to play the bonus round, in which the contestant has a chance to win thousands of dollars, with the actual amount dependent on the rules in place at the time of the episode.

programme.title: Card Sharks
programme.desc: This show from legendary Mark Goodson-Bill Todman Productions features two contestants trying to predict answers to survey questions for the opportunity to play a game with oversized playing cards for a chance to win cash. One contestant guesses how many people (out of 100) gave a certain answer to a question and the other contestant then guesses if the number is higher or lower than the opponent's guess. The winning contestant then faces a row of cards and must determine if each succeeding card is higher or lower than the one that precedes it. The contestant who wins two out of three games wins the match and plays the bonus round, called Money Cards. The Money Cards round is similar to the card game in the main game but with three levels of cards instead of one row. The contestant is given $200 at the beginning of Money Cards and wagers any or all of that money when guessing if the cards will be higher or lower than the previous one. A perfect round could earn the contestant $28,800.

programme.desc: Two European knights of fortune have traveled to China in their search for a magical black powder that can wreak havoc. When they suddenly come under attack by some monstrous figures, they seek refuge.

programme.desc: In the American Old West, a sheriff, his deputy, a gunslinger and a cowboy embark together on a mission to rescue three people from a terrifying group of cannibalistic cave dwellers.

programme.title: In Fear
programme.desc: Driving to a music festival in Ireland, a new couple become lost and are then set upon by a tormentor with an unknown motive.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: SpongeBob goes on a quest to discover a stolen recipe that takes him to our world, where he tangles with a pirate.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: Denny Swift is a Formula One race car driver who understands that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate everyday life. Besides his career, Denny has three loves of his life -- his beautiful wife, their young daughter and his best friend -- a dog who wants to be reincarnated into a human.

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: Thriller set against the background of the gold rush in the Canadian Rockies. A man jailed for murder falls for the beautiful saloon singer who looked after his son while he was inside. He tries to conceal his criminal past from his son, but that is the least of their problems when the trio are left defenceless against rampaging Indians.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: A romance novelist teams up with an adventurer in a South American jungle to ransom her sister with a legendary jewel.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Left behind when his family goes away for Christmas vacation, Kevin McCallister enjoys unprecedented freedom of the house and the possessions of his siblings. Using an array of homemade weaponry, he manages to fend off a pair of dim-witted burglars.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: Otto, a crotchety, irritable, and fiercely strict widower, lives a lonely life, judging everyone he sees. When he forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbours, Otto begins to change.

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: Following a group of women in England whose partners are away serving in Afghanistan. Faced with the men's absences, they form a choir and quickly find themselves at the centre of a media sensation and global movement. Inspired by global phenomenon of military wives choirs, the story celebrates a band of misfit women who form a choir on a military base.

programme.title: The Future
programme.desc: Sophie and Jason are in their mid-30s, childless and stuck in jobs that were supposed to be `just for now' - she teaches dance to kids, he operates an IT helpdesk from their shared home - but have seemingly set them on a road to nowhere. The realisation that, if they want to make something of their lives, they need to find direction hits with a jolt. One upshot is that they decide to adopt a down-on-its-luck cat.

programme.desc: An Army outpost doctor clashes with his commander when he attempts to treat a band of malaria-stricken Indians.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: A realistic and well-documented film re-enacting the events that led up to the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor, which plunged the United States into World War II. Boasting Oscar-winning special effects, the film gives both the Japanese and American perspectives on events and highlights some of the major and minor errors that were made on both sides.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late-night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: A divorced couple teams up and travels to Bali to stop their daughter from making the same mistake they think they made 25 years ago.

programme.title: Baby Ruby [NEW]
programme.desc: The tightly scripted world of a vlogger and influencer unravels after she becomes a mother.

programme.title: The Winter Guest
programme.desc: A recent widow who is determined to leave Scotland for Australia with her son gets an unexpected visit from her ageing mother.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: A band of Confederate soldiers capture a large consignment of Yankee gold, then go on the run with their haul when they realise that the war has ended. Although no longer threatened by the Yankees, they soon find themselves under attack from ruthless bandits determined to get their hands on the gold.

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat
programme.desc: A humourless Russian, Captain Vinka Kovelenko, defects from her home country. Major Chuck Lockwood is assigned to show her the bright lights of London while she tries to convince him of the superiority of communism. Naturally, the two opposites fall in love but then must contend with the KGB, who are not happy with the idea of one of their officers running around free in London.

programme.title: Hell Is a City
programme.desc: A British police inspector waits for an escaped local criminal to return to his home in Manchester to pick up the spoils from his last job.

programme.title: Robin and Marian
programme.desc: The tale of Robin Hood and Maid Marian in their twilight years. Robin, back from the Crusades, finds his love has become the Abbess of a priory and that his arch enemy, the Sheriff of Nottingham still wants him dead.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Apocalyptic thriller in which life on Earth is threatened by a rogue comet. When a reporter in pursuit of a Washington sex scandal is arrested by the FBI, she discovers that the story is an inconsequential part of a huge cover-up. She soon finds herself in possession of the biggest story in the history of humankind, the planet will be destroyed in one year, unless a risky outer-space mission can deflect the comet.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Paul Edgecomb, the head guard of death row, just wants life for him, his colleagues and the condemned to be nice and easy. However, when John Coffee, a massive man convicted of brutally killing a pair of young sisters arrives, things start to get strange. Beyond his simple, naïve nature and a deathly fear of the dark, Coffey seems to possess a prodigious, supernatural gift. Paul begins to question whether Coffey was truly guilty of murdering the two girls.

programme.title: Open Range
programme.desc: Two free-grazing cattlemen, looking to live a peaceful life, find their peace is shattered and they are forced to ride for revenge when a ruthless rancher attempts to run them out of town.

programme.title: Yes
programme.desc: An American woman and a Middle-Eastern man confront some of the greatest conflicts of our generation: religious, political and sexual a pair of new lovers leaving a trail of heartbreak behind them as they embark on a tumultuous journey across continents and cultures.

programme.title: The Dreamers
programme.desc: The tumultuous political landscape of Paris in 1968 is the backdrop as three young cineastes are drawn together through their passion for film.

programme.title: The Big Wedding
programme.desc: With an all-star cast led by Robert DeNiro, Katherine Heigl, Diane Keaton, Amanda Seyfried with Susan Sarandon and Robin Williams, THE BIG WEDDING is an romantic comedy about a charmingly modern family trying to survive a weekend wedding celebration that has the potential to become a family fiasco.

programme.title: Still Today
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, Pete's groomsman give him a wedding gift he'll never forget. An escort. Maybe it's the Lunar Eclipse, maybe it's fate, but after a magical night in the city maybe this girl is what Pete needed all along.

programme.title: Love's Second Chance
programme.desc: Passionate fashion stylist Rose is living her best life in NYC when she suddenly inherits her grandmother's vintage dress shop and must return to her small hometown. There, she runs into her charming high school crush Cole Murphey, who helps her renovate the store.

programme.title: A Rainy Day in New York
programme.desc: Woody Allen's romantic comedy A RAINY DAY IN NEW YORK tells the story of college sweethearts, Gatsby (Timothée Chalamet) and Ashleigh (Elle Fanning), whose plans for a romantic weekend together in New York City are dashed as quickly as the sunlight turns into showers.

programme.title: Love & Where to Find It
programme.desc: Two local coffee shop business owners despise each other in real life, but fall in love while unknowingly sending each other messages via a dating app on their friends' behalf.

programme.title: Aristotle and Dante
programme.desc: Mexican teenagers Aristotle Mendoza and Dante Quintana explore their friendship while struggling with racial and ethnic identity, sexuality and family relationships in 1987 El Paso, Texas. Based on the book by Benjamin Alire Sáenz

programme.title: Calling for Love
programme.desc: When successful podcaster Samantha Desouza is re-assigned to host Heartwaves, a feel-good love song show with a segment that reunites lost loves, she is less than impressed – love isn't her favourite topic right now.

programme.title: A Week in Paradise
programme.desc: A film star with a newly broken heart jets off to paradise in the Caribbean, where she finds not only herself again, but maybe even a new love.

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: The perfect world of a beautiful Seattle television reporter is shattered by the prediction of her death in seven days.

programme.title: Cooking with Love
programme.desc: Hardworking & optimistic television producer, Kelly, doesn't have time for love. Along with her mentor Amanda, Kelly dives into another season of the Little Gourmet, a kids cooking show, when hot-headed Chef Stephen is dropped into Kelly's life as a last minute replacement host.

programme.title: A Slice of Chicago Romance
programme.desc: In a suburb of Chicago, Romanos & Juliatos, two pizza places, have competed for the town's business for years. When both restaurants get passed down to—RILEY (30s) and SARAH (30s)—after a new pizza chain moves into town, the new bosses struggle to compete after they begin to fall for one another.

programme.title: Love on Harbor Island
programme.desc: When Seattle interior designer Lily Summers returns to her hometown to help her Aunt Maggie run her marina-side bed and breakfast, she meets Marcus, the handsome seaplane pilot whose life's work delivering rescue dogs helps Lily discover that home really is where the heart is.

programme.title: In from the Side
programme.desc: In from the Side' is the story of an adulterous affair between two members of a fictional South London gay rugby club. The film explores the multiple types of connections that can occur within a large group of gay men in a team sports environment…

programme.title: I Want You Back
programme.desc: Peter and Emma thought they were on the precipice of life's biggest moments – marriage, kids, and houses in the suburbs – until their respective partners dumped them.

programme.title: Yes, God, Yes
programme.desc: Growing up in the Midwest in the early OOs, sixteen-year-old Alice has always been a good Catholic. But when an innocent AOL chat turns racy, she discovers masturbation and is overwhelmed with guilt. Seeking redemption, she attends a mysterious religious retreat to try and suppress her urges...

programme.title: The Legend of Barney Thomson
programme.desc: Comedy drama as Robert Carlyle plays Barney Thomson, a downtrodden barber who has fallen from grace in his meagre barbering life. One day whilst almost losing his job, Barney comically falls into the unthinkable role of a serial killer.

programme.title: Killing Gunther
programme.desc: A dysfunctional team of young assassins set out to make a name for themselves by killing the most notorious hitman of all time, Gunther (Arnold Schwarzenegger).

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) is an ordinary girl who becomes an accidental princess when a family summer trip to Paris turns into the fantasy of a lifetime. Living like royalty, Grace, along with her two best friends, discovers who she really is – by assuming another person's identity.

programme.title: Uptown Girls
programme.desc: Ray is a fussy nine-year-old girl whose last nanny just ran out. When Ray's way-too-busy mom hires Molly to be Ray's new nanny, it's the perfect setup for both girls to change their ways and discover that sometimes your best friend can come in the form that you least expect!

programme.title: The Heist
programme.desc: It was a stroke of genius, but now the perfect crime is turning into a perfect disaster.

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: A couple going through a divorce squabble over custody of their beloved dog.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Undercover Agent Malcolm Turner is back and this time he's out to expose the suspected designer of a deadly computer "worm" that would allow outside forces access to sophistical and critical government intelligence files.

programme.title: Girl Most Likely
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig stars as Imogene, once a promising young New York playwright whose promise has fizzled, thanks to a crisis of confidence. Heavily in denial about being dumped by her society boyfriend, Imogene uses her skill for drama to stage an elaborate fake suicide as an appeal for his sympathy.

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Big Momma is back — and this time he has big backup: his teenage stepson Trent (Brendan T. Jackson). Martin Lawrence returns as FBI agent Malcolm Turner and as Turner's deep-cover alter-ego Big Momma.

programme.title: Horror of Frankenstein
programme.desc: Victor Frankenstein, descendant of the infamous scientist, Baron Von Frankenstein, follows in his experimental footsteps. Initially his success involves the resuscitation of a tortoise and progressing onto more ambitious projects, including creating his own monster. The gothic genre is re-worked to create a drama of black humour and farce.On the sudden death of his father, young Victor Frankenstein inherits his title, his castle and his taste for grisly experiments. He hires a grave robber to provide him with material for his hideous work. With the aid of a violent electric storm a monster jolts into life and then escapes to the woods...

programme.desc: An artist's model, with aspirations to be an amateur detective, helps a Scotland Yard detective break a gang helping Nazi war criminals escape from Europe.

programme.desc: When a journalist begins his investigations into the murder of a woman, he is joined by a pretty female reporter who is more intent on catching him than the murderer.

programme.desc: When John falls in love with his wife's sister he asks his wife for a divorce. Their plans are ruined when it is revealed that it is illegal for him to marry his divorced wife's sister. When she suddenly dies it looks suspiciously like murder.

programme.title: The Embezzler
programme.desc: When an elderly bank clerk with only two years to live absconds with the contents of a bank safe, his plan to escape to a hot and exciting South American country to live out his final years in a blaze of fun and wealth becomes ever more precarious.

programme.title: The Hideout
programme.desc: Helen has to deliver a case. When the case is mistaken as part of Steve's luggage he gives it to his friend, Tim, to return. Tim opens the case to find it is full of money, which leads him to Helen's father and a whole lot of trouble.

programme.title: Blackmail

programme.title: House in Nightmare Park
programme.desc: Foster Twelve trees, who gives hammy readings from the classics, cannot believe his luck when Stewart Henderson and his sister offer him a fee to give a reading at their eerie stately mansion.

programme.title: Night of the Eagle

programme.desc: While the rest of the group gets creative and makes new, personalized gifts from scratch. In the end, it's a reminder that it's not about the gifts—it's about the thought and effort you put into showing you care.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
programme.desc: The Avengers must now fight one of their own, and they're not sure what to do! Cap and Thor lead the charge, but can't fend off Iron Man and Ultron's Minions. Meanwhile, Black Widow, Hawkeye and Hulk track down a signal that seems to be controlling Iron Man from a castle in the “Little Sokovia” section of New York. There they fight HYDRA and BARON VON STRUCKER and learn that YELLOWJACKET is the “bug” that infected Iron Man's suit for Ultron. To help break Iron Man free from Ultron's control, the Avengers call in their own bug...ANT MAN! The Avengers prepare for a party with a surprise guest when Ultron crashes the preparations by using mind control on Iron Man. While trying to rescue their leader, the rest of the team discovers that Baron Stucker, HYDRA, and Yellowjacket are in on Ultron's plans. programme.title: The Book Of Obsession
programme.desc: The Knights are tasked with protecting the King's valuable Ned Knights comic book during the Bookingheim Knight-a-Con. But with all the costumed kids there, will they recognize the real Jestro and Book of Monsters coming to get them? King Halbert instructs the Knights that they must take his valuable Ned Knights comic book to the “Knight-a-Kon” in Bookingham. It will be the first be first prize at the Knight-a-Kon. But the Book of Monsters wants the book, too. Having devoured Ned Knightly comic books in it's down time it has become fanatically obsessed with the storyline. General Magmar suggests they simply attack the place and take what they want, but Jestro tells them they can't: everyone will be in costume and they'll be thousands of comics there. This calls for a clever “infiltration” mission (which will also allow Jestro to see the Kon, which he's always wanted to do.) So Jestro goes into the Kon with the BOM and some monsters. And it's easy because everyone is in costume Jestro,

programme.title: Ley-La, Rise of a Music Star
programme.desc: Olly is feeling the intense pressure of their newfound fame, and it's starting to take a toll on him. He's caught up in the glamour and the spotlight, but it's beginning to cloud his judgment and affect his relationships with his friends.

programme.title: Rise Of The Snakes
programme.desc: The four Ninja are snapped out of their post-hero complacency when Lord Garmadon's young son Lloyd shows up and tries to pick up where his father left off. The Ninja dismiss him as a threat, but regret that choice after Lloyd wakes up the evil snake tribe. A prophecy is revealed that states a green ninja will ultimately defeat Lord Garmadon.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes
programme.desc: Spider-Man and Marvel's Super Heroes take on a mischievous Loki and a team of super villains in an all-new LEGO adventure

programme.title: The Book Of Monsters, Part 1
programme.desc: When Jestro the Jester finds the Book of Monsters, chaos breaks loose in the Kingdom of Knighton. Can the newly graduated Knights from the Knights' Academy save the kingdom? It's final graduation fighting exams for the latest Knights from Knights' Academy. All our new Knights demonstrate their prowess: CLAY, AARON, AXL and LANCE. PRINCESS MACY get to join them, but her father doesn't want her to graduate. As part of the entertainment, MERLOK does an amazing magic trick. His act is followed by…JESTRO, the King's Jester. He's terrible (and he should know to never follow a better act.) Everyone laughed because he's a real joke....a total failure. While Jestro roams the halls fo the King's Castle, forlorn, he hears the BOOK OF MONSTERS calling to him from Merlok's library. The book talks Jestro into gathering as many books of spells as he can carry, but they're interrupted by...Clay! As Jestro quickly pages through the Book of Monsters to attack Clay, Merlok arrives. There's a battle in th

programme.title: The Legends of CHIMA
programme.desc: Laval the Lion and Cragger the Crocodile are the best of friends. But when young Cragger becomes king of the Crocodiles, he tries to conquer all of the CHI. Former friends become worst enemies.

programme.title: Mission: Critical!
programme.desc: Owen and Claire must rescue a theme-park reviewer from a sabotaged aerialtram - and a salivating T-Rex.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: Sky News
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive round-up of some of the latest and biggest news stories from the United Kingdom and the world.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Bantling Boy Barnaby and Scott enter the world of horseracing when the trainer of thoroughbred Bantling Boy is battered to death. Bruce Hartley was an alcoholic who had vowed to expose the reason why his father bequeathed the horse to four Midsomer villagers. The other members of the syndicate come under suspicion, but the killing continues - then Bantling Boy falls ill.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Second Sight Barnaby and Scott investigate a death in Midsomer Mere, where the villagers appear to be able to predict the future. As the investigation continues, further deaths occur and Barnaby must delve into the village's history for clues to solve the murders.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Hidden Depths When a solicitor falls from a roof to his death, Barnaby and Scott investigate whether it was suicide or murder. They discover that a rival lawyer was spreading harmful rumours about the dead man, but when this man is drugged and killed as well, the motive looks like revenge - but for what?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Sauce for the Goose Barnaby and Scott delve into the murder of a visitor to Plummer's Relish factory, and discover that the dead man was employed by a rival company. Further investigation reveals a web of secrets and lies within the Plummer family, and a campaign to frighten the family matriarch - but why?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When retired music teacher Arthur Leggott is battered to death at his cottage, an unpublished musical score by the late Joan Alder, famous composer of `Midsomer Rhapsody', is unearthed.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The peaceful setting of prestigious Whiteoaks Golf Club is rocked by death and controversy when a golfer is bludgeoned to death near the notorious 13th hole known as Crisp's Folly. Barnaby and Jones discover gambling is rife at the club - along with illegal money-lending and violent assault. Then, as the club considers giving ordinary villagers full membership rights, another golfer is killed.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Barnaby finds a tangled world of crime and intrigue in the art world. A recently discovered masterpiece by local artist Henry Hogson realises an impressive price at auction just hours before its previous owner is tortured and killed. Can Barnaby and Jones prevent the body count from rising further?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: DCI Barnaby's secret past as a spy is revealed when a former agent is found dead after a cricket match in Midsomer Parva. While locals blame the brutal killing on the `beast of Midsomer', Barnaby suspects otherwise. He soon finds links to a network of spies that operated in Cold War Berlin, but his investigation is obstructed at every turn.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Science fellow George Jeffers threatens to go public with what he believes is a potentially lethal software glitch in a new air traffic control system. American software boss Clinton Finn fears he will lose millions if the truth comes out and puts pressure on the University authorities, but when village schoolteacher Emily Harte is killed by a hit-and-run driver, Barnaby wonders if Jeffers was the real target.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The peace of Little Worthy is shattered by a bizarre murder when a man is found stabbed and tied down like Gulliver in Lilliput in the sleepy hamlet's model village. Barnaby and Jones are called in, and they find many secrets hidden behind the traditions, tourist attractions and tea rooms. Then, the killer strikes again. Can the detectives discover the truth about the residents of Little Worthy and solve the crimes?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A burglar known as `the Creeper' terrorises Midsomer as Barnaby and Jones investigate the murder of a dinner party guest at upper-crust Chettham Park House. The detectives discover a group of high society friends with links both to gangsters and the Chief Constable dating back to the 1960s, but do the friends also have secrets worth killing for?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Schoolteacher Connie Bishop keeps waking in the night, convinced she has an intruder. Just days later a local councillor, said to be obsessed with her, is found murdered in her garden. Is Connie the innocent victim she seems? Barnaby and Jones uncover jealous rivals, ruthless social climbers and a cottage with secrets as they search for the killer in Badger's Drift.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Midsomer is buzzing with excitement at the arrival of the annual Paramount Dance Extravaganza. Behind the sequins and smiles are deep running feuds and passions, and when the stakes are high, the desire to win has outweighed everything.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The worlds of miniature dolls houses and real houses collide when prolific real estate agent Alexander Beauvoisin is murdered in front of a crowd at the unveiling of a new dolls house collection at Midsomer Museum of the family.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.desc: Sonic and The Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's underground air base in a mission to reprogram the launch data on Robotnik's fleet of Stealth-Bot aircraft. While attempting to reprogram the Stealth-Bot computer system.

programme.title: Téléfoot
programme.desc: S27 E9 Chaque dimanche, retrouvez le meilleur du football et notamment toutes les actualités de la Ligue 1 McDonald's : résumés des matchs, reportages, coulisses, portraits et interviews exclusives. A la présentation du magazine historique, Grégoire Margotton vous donne rendez-vous accompagné du champion du monde Bixente Lizarazu ou de Rio Mavuba, ancien international français et champion de France avec Lille. A leurs côtés, les journalistes Thomas Mekhiche et Sévérine Parlakou complètent l'équipe.

programme.title: Automoto
programme.desc: S27 E9 Nouveau logo, nouveau décor, nouvel habillage et nouvelle pilote : Automoto, présentée par Jean-Pierre Gagick, fait peau neuve. Cette saison, pour la première fois dans une émission automobile en France, une pilote réalisera les essais chronométrés : Sarah Bovy, la première femme à avoir signé une pole position en championnat du monde d'endurance, prendra place aux côtés des pilotes historiques de l'émission comme Anthony Beltoise ou Bruce Jouanny. Côté motos, les habitués d'Automoto pourront également retrouver Bader Benlekehal. En parallèle, l'émission continuera de proposer une large diversité de sujets et de reportages : nouvelle rubrique pratique, essais, comparatifs, sports mécaniques, vintage, l'objectif est de réunir et d'expliquer les thématiques automobiles et motos au plus grand nombre.

programme.title: Les douze coups de midi
programme.desc: E56 Tout au long de la semaine, les candidats qui rivalisent pour devenir "Maître de midi", permettent également à l'association ELA (Association Européenne contre les Leucodystrophies) de récolter 5000 € par bonne réponse. Le dimanche 19 octobre, Jean-Luc Reichmann remettra à la présidente de l'association, Crystelle Cottard, un chèque correspondant au montant total collecté.

programme.title: Petits plats en équilibre

programme.title: Grands reportages
programme.desc: E1 Changement de propriétaires Chaque année en France, environ un million de transactions immobilières sont signées. Et quand vient le moment de vendre ou d'acheter, c'est plus qu'une maison, un appartement ou un local qui change de mains. A chaque fois, c'est une aventure avec ses espoirs et ses épreuves. Pendant plus d'un an, une équipe a suivi des femmes, des hommes, des couples, des familles qui font le grand saut.

Pendant plusieurs mois, une équipe a suivi celles et ceux qui font battre le coeur du plus grand marché d'antiquités au monde. Ils sont antiquaires, jeunes ou aguerris, experts, et tous ont accepté de dévoiler leurs petits secrets.

programme.title: Les Feux de l'amour
programme.desc: La famille Abbott, installée à Genoa City, dans le Wisconsin, possède une immense fortune et une gigantesque entreprise. Les luttes de pouvoir, trahisons au sein même du clan sont monnaie courante. Leur ennemi de toujours, l'industriel Victor Newman, ne fait rien pour leur faciliter la tâche, bien au contraire. D'alliances en ruptures, les illusions de chacun se heurtent à l'hostilité, à la jalousie et à la haine des autres. Entre amour et pouvoir, le choix est souvent celui de la puissance. Un Soap Opera mondialement célèbre, produit et diffusé depuis plus de quarante ans aux Etats-Unis ! A ce jour, une trentaine de pays différents diffusent le feuilleton chaque jour, et c'est en France que le feuilleton réalise ses meilleures audiences, juste derrière les Etats-Unis La famille Abbott, installée à Genoa City, dans le Wisconsin, possède une immense fortune et une gigantesque entreprise. programme.title: Plus belle la vie, encore plus belle
programme.desc: Le coupable de la tentative de meurtre révèle ses motivations. Barbara invite Luna, Blanche et Jennifer à une virée au restaurant. A la résidence, Nisma prend une décision qu'elle partage avec Apolline. Thomas croit que Riva a replongé, mais Léa lui fait une révélation surprenante. Patrick a toujours du mal à trouver sa place et Mirta et Yolande organisent une formation premiers secours. Plusieurs acteurs de "Plus belle la vie" reprennent leur personnage dans cette suite qui se place dans la continuité directe de la première série Une habitante du Mistral se retrouve à nouveau en danger, menacée par une source mystérieuse. Pendant ce temps, Apolline attend avec anxiété un verdict crucial. De son côté, Baptiste fait une rencontre qui risque de susciter la jalousie dans son entourage.. Marion Lallier - Réalisateur Nicolas Viegeolat - Réalisateur Olivier Chapelle - Réalisateur Lionel Smila - Réalisateur Pascal Heylbroeck - Réalisateur Claire de la Rochefoucauld - Réalisateur Sébastien Pou

programme.title: Un Noël top secret
programme.desc: Whitney mène une existence paisible de bibliothécaire, une vie sans risque, conforme au modèle inculqué par ses parents. Quand elle accepte un rendez-vous arrangé par son amie Rachel, elle se trompe de personne et s'assoit en face d'un agent du FBI en pleine mission secrète. Elle se retrouve alors embarquée dans une enquête sur des voleurs d'objets d'art et prend peu à peu goût à l'aventure. Josh, son coéquipier, a l'habitude de travailler en solo, mais découvre rapidement les qualités de sa partenaire et pour la première fois, la joie des fêtes de Noël.. programme.title: Une nounou au service de Sa Majesté
programme.desc: Une menace plane sur la princesse Rose, ses enfants et son frère cadet, le prince Colin. Les services de la sûreté décident de placer deux agents, sous couverture, au palais. L'un d'eux doit se faire passer pour la nouvelle nounou. Mais gagner la confiance des enfants va s'avérer plus difficile que prévu pour Claire Champion, d'autant qu'elle tombe peu à peu sous le charme du prince Colin. De plus, celui-ci est soupçonné d'être directement mêlé à la menace.. programme.title: Ici tout commence
programme.desc: Dans le contexte du concours d'entrée à l'Institut Auguste Armand, le retour de Louis, qui s'allie à Teyssier pour faire tomber un candidat qu'il juge arrogant, est insolite. Anouk est sacrée meilleure cheffe du monde. Ses méthodes ont bousculé l'Institut et ont créé des tensions, notamment avec Teyssier et Clotilde, qui préfèrent des approches plus traditionnelles. Fleur Pessin, Anouk Revero, César Verneuil et Bianca Roma sont les nouveaux personnages qui font leurs débuts au casting de cette sixième saison Face à Bérénice, Carla jette l'éponge. A la ferme, Gaspard fait place nette. programme.title: Demain nous appartient
programme.desc: Un violent séisme frappe la ville de Sète. Les secours sont mobilisés pour faire face à cette situation d'urgence. Tandis que l'hôpital déclenche le Plan Blanc, les écoles sont évacuées. Dans le chaos qui s'ensuit, les personnalités des uns et des autres s'expriment de manière exacerbée. Une saison 9 marquée notamment par le départ de Romane Parc dans le rôle de Lilou Clavel et Patrick Seminor dans celui de Joël Tundis Samuel prend son rôle d'encadrant au sérieux. Martin appréhende la surprise de ses collègues. programme.title: Tirage du Loto

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Le commandant Robert Hicks ne cache pas qu'il n'est pas satisfait du choix de Hondo, qui vient d'annoncer l'arrivée d'un nouvel agent au sein de l'unité. Ce dernier, Devin Gamble, est le fils d'un homme qui a tué un officier de police une décennie plus tôt. Hondo se démène pour rassurer ses collègues et pour les convaincre du bienfondé de son acte. Entre les kidnappings, les cambriolages, les prises d'otages ou encore aux menaces d'attaques terroristes, l'équipe doit faire preuve de sang froid pour mener à bien toutes ses périlleuses missions. Suspense et rebondissement au programme de cette huitième saison, dont les producteurs ont annoncé qu'elle serait la dernière de cette série plébiscitée par le public Deux jeunes Indiens sont pris pour cible par des tireurs alors qu'ils roulent tranquillement sur l'autoroute. programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: Hondo est en voyage en Thaïlande avec l'un de ses anciens compagnons d'armes, pour un entraînement avec les forces spéciales locales. Les choses prennent une mauvaise tournure lorsque les deux hommes se font enlever et se retrouvent au coeur d'une nature sauvage, empêtrés dans une affaire de drogue. Une mission d'envergure internationale se met en place et le SWAT est prêt à intervenir, même en terrain inconnu. Mais les troubles de Los Angeles ne sont jamais loin et le retour au bercail est mouvementé. Le début de cette sixième saison a été partiellement délocalisé en Thaïlande, avec Sean Maguire (Once Upon a Time) en invité spécial Tan et Cabrera sont témoins d'un accident de la route. La responsable, Jane, 17 ans, a été enlevée et est parvenue à s'échapper. Elle leur demande de sauver sa soeur Natalie toujours aux mains des ravisseurs. programme.desc: Hondo est en voyage en Thaïlande avec l'un de ses anciens compagnons d'armes, pour un entraînement avec les forces spéciales locales. Les choses prennent une mauvaise tournure lorsque les deux hommes se font enlever et se retrouvent au coeur d'une nature sauvage, empêtrés dans une affaire de drogue. Une mission d'envergure internationale se met en place et le SWAT est prêt à intervenir, même en terrain inconnu. Mais les troubles de Los Angeles ne sont jamais loin et le retour au bercail est mouvementé. Le début de cette sixième saison a été partiellement délocalisé en Thaïlande, avec Sean Maguire (Once Upon a Time) en invité spécial De mystérieux braquages font plusieurs victimes, alors que les voleurs n'emportent que certains bijoux bien spécifiques. Il s'agit de ressortissants syriens qui tentent de récupérer les joyaux qui ornaient un exemplaire unique du Coran, dérobé en Syrie par un soldat américain. programme.title: Les Feux de l'amour
programme.desc: La famille Abbott, installée à Genoa City, dans le Wisconsin, possède une immense fortune et une gigantesque entreprise. Les luttes de pouvoir, trahisons au sein même du clan sont monnaie courante. Leur ennemi de toujours, l'industriel Victor Newman, ne fait rien pour leur faciliter la tâche, bien au contraire. D'alliances en ruptures, les illusions de chacun se heurtent à l'hostilité, à la jalousie et à la haine des autres. Entre amour et pouvoir, le choix est souvent celui de la puissance. Un Soap Opera mondialement célèbre, produit et diffusé depuis plus de quarante ans aux Etats-Unis ! A ce jour, une trentaine de pays différents diffusent le feuilleton chaque jour, et c'est en France que le feuilleton réalise ses meilleures audiences, juste derrière les Etats-Unis La famille Abbott, installée à Genoa City, dans le Wisconsin, possède une immense fortune et une gigantesque entreprise. programme.title: Plus belle la vie, encore plus belle
programme.desc: Le coupable de la tentative de meurtre révèle ses motivations. Barbara invite Luna, Blanche et Jennifer à une virée au restaurant. A la résidence, Nisma prend une décision qu'elle partage avec Apolline. Thomas croit que Riva a replongé, mais Léa lui fait une révélation surprenante. Patrick a toujours du mal à trouver sa place et Mirta et Yolande organisent une formation premiers secours. Plusieurs acteurs de "Plus belle la vie" reprennent leur personnage dans cette suite qui se place dans la continuité directe de la première série Patrick lance une enquête après la dégradation de l'état d'une résidente. Pendant ce temps, Djawad hésite face aux propositions d'Aya et Luna pour Halloween. A l'université, Zoé s'engage pour la communauté étudiante, prête à user de tromperie pour atteindre ses objectifs.. Marion Lallier - Réalisateur Nicolas Viegeolat - Réalisateur Olivier Chapelle - Réalisateur Lionel Smila - Réalisateur Pascal Heylbroeck - Réalisateur Claire de la Rochefoucauld - Réalisate

programme.title: Le concours des lettres de Noël
programme.desc: L'excentrique Settie Rose engage Juan, un romancier en mal d'inspiration, pour écrire sa lettre pour un concours de Noël. Une confusion inattendue fait rapidement naître des rumeurs : Juan serait fiancé à Lily, la fille de Settie. Pour désamorcer la situation avec humour, la famille décide de jouer le jeu.. Heather Hawthorn Doyle - Réalisateur Angela Kinsey - Settie Rose Lillian Doucet-Roche - Lily Jeff Reyes - Bradley Alec Santos - Juan Colleen Wheeler - Sue Andy Thompson - Hank Jake Foy - Jack Barbara Pollard - Edith Ashley Ross - Victoria Jorge Montesi - Abuelo Fred Ewanuick - Paddy Garry Chalk - Charles Suzanne Arnott - Producteur Michael Shepard - Producteur Fernando Szew - Producteur Ivan Hayden - Producteur Kim Arnott - Producteur Robyn Snyder - Producteur.

programme.title: Lettres magiques au père Noël
programme.desc: Sam et Izzy rendent visite au Père Noël dans une librairie. Il leur donne un stylo magique pour dresser leur liste de cadeaux. A chaque lettre, leur grand-mère se plie en quatre pour exaucer leurs voeux. Mais leur souhait le plus cher, c'est de voir leurs parents, Rebecca et Enrique, à nouveau réunis.. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: NASCAR superstar Ricky Bobby is at the top of his game; adored by fans, a trophy wife by his side, and incredible wealth. But Ricky loses it all when French Formula One champion Jean Girard roars onto the scene. Ricky, with the help of his ruthless father, must pull himself out of the depths of despair and restore his honor on the racetrack.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) are workers who would like nothing better than to grind their oppressive employers into the dirt. Quitting their jobs is not an option, so -- fueled by alcohol and dubious advice from a criminal (Jamie Foxx) -- the men devise a complex and seemingly foolproof plan to permanently rid themselves of their terrible bosses. The problem is, any plan is only as clever as the brains behind it.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Tired of always answering to others, Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) go into business for themselves. After demonstrating the prototype for an invention called the Shower Buddy, the guys attract the attention of Rex Hanson and his father, Bert. Bert invests in the trio's product, then cancels the order and steals their idea. Now heavily in debt and with no legal recourse, Nick, Dale and Kurt decide to kidnap Rex and use the ransom money to pay off their loans.

programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians, former showgirl Rachel Phelps (Margaret Whitton), has a sweetheart deal to move the team to Miami. But to break the lease with the city of Cleveland, ticket sales have to plummet. So Phelps hires the most incompetent players available, including near-blind pitcher Rick Vaughn (Charlie Sheen) and injury-prone catcher Jake Taylor (Tom Berenger). But her villainous tactics accidentally foster a can-do team spirit, turning the Indians into potential winners.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: S17 E11 Martin and Lucy visit a Martin and Lucy visit a cottage in Cornwall, a flat in Shepherd's Bush, London and a former jewelers shop in Denton, Manchester.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: S17 E12 Martin and Lucy visit a small historic building in Derby, a cottage in Faversham, Kent and a two bedroom flat in Durham. All of these properties have been sold at auction and we'll find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: S17 E13 Martin and Lucy visit a house in Cumbria, a first floor flat in East London and a house in Derbyshire. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid when they went under the hammer.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: S17 E14 Martin and Lucy visit a flat in Fulham, London, a double property in Dover and a semi detatched house in Northumberland. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.desc: S17 E15 Martin and Lucy visit a property in Durham, a flat in Fulham, London and a cottage in Cornwall. All of these properties have been sold at auction and we'll find out who bought them and what they paid when they went under the hammer.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Hammersmith, London, a mid terrace in Gillingham, Kent and a house in Derbyshire. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid when they went under the hammer.

programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit an apartment in Cornwall, a house in County Durham and a property in Chiswick, London. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid when they went under the hammer.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a one bedroom flat in Cardiff, a house in Dover, Kent and an end of terrace in Middleborough. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid when they went under the hammer.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a detached cottage in Bodmin, Cornwall, a two bedroom house in London and a plot of land in Tipton, West Midlands. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a semidetached property in Stoke, a plot of land in Romney Marsh, Kent, and a three bedroom house in Eccles. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a building plot in Four Elms, Kent, a property in Darlington and a three bed semi in Alvaston, Derby. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a detached house in Hatton, Derby, a semi in Twickenham, Middlesex and a one bedroom flat in Newcastle. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a Grade 2 cottage in Kent, a property in Peckham, London and a former public house in Whitehaven, Cumbria. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a former inn in Salisbury, a flat in Dover, Kent and a house in Newcastle. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid when they went under the hammer.
