programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit a property in Cornwall a three bedroom mid terrace house in London and a house in Haslingden, Manchester. All of these properties have been sold at auction and well find out who bought them and what they paid.

programme.title: The Magic Stick
programme.desc: With a borrowed recipe from Homnibus, Papa Smurf creates a magic stick that Clumsy takes and loses in the woods. Soon after, Bigmouth comes for a visit and before he eats all the smurfberries, Papa Smurf finds the magic stick and whisks the giant away.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Born Rotten: As the Smurfs prepare for the Festival of the Stars, Gargamel plants a creature in their midst that smells so rotten that he can easily be traced to the Smurf village. Papa Smurf realizes that Born Rotten is from another planet, and he instructs Feathers to return him to his home before Gargamel finds them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Three Smurfketeers: In another Smurf theatrical super-production based – very loosely – on Alexandre Dumas' characters, a masterpiece of the stage is created, with a few lines from Romeo and Juliet thrown in.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Clockwork Smurf: Handy has built a very complex Smurf machine that does everything. It proves dangerous when it nearly destroys the village, but comes in useful when, with the help of the other Smurfs, it saves the young prince Gerard's kingdom from the queen aunt Imperia's dastardly intentions.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fountain Of Smurf: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa Smurf's book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Once In A Blue Moon: Once in a blue moon, as the legend goes, a baby Smurf is delivered to the Smurfs and everyone in the village becomes attached to the new arrival. But a mistake has been made and the stork returns to take the baby back. Grouchy and Smurfette have become so attached to the baby that the baby is returned.

programme.title: Smurfing In Sign Language
programme.desc: The Smurfs meet a woodland elf, who teaches them sign language after Gargamel inflicts a no-speaking potion on them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby Smurf Is Missing: Thinking Baby Smurf is a leprechaun, two poachers kidnap him and try to get the small one to tell them where his pot of gold is hidden. Papa Smurf organizes everyone to attack the villains with Smurfberry pies so Baby can escape.

programme.title: The Littlest Witch
programme.desc: On an errand to Witch Haven for Papa Smurf, the little blue creatures meet a tiny witch and teach her how to be good while at the same time cause another witch to lose her wicked powers for one year after she falls into the river.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfstone Quest: In the distant valley of Nodrog, the Smurfs meet the Molians who try to dissuade them from obtaining the magical Smurf-stone that Papa Smurf needs to cure his gout.

programme.title: Smurfy Acres
programme.desc: The Smurfs learn there's no place like home when Gargamel gets the Book of Spells to conjure up a new and more beautiful place for the Smurfs to live a place that is very convenient for him to lay a trap for them!

programme.title: Wedding Bells For Gargamel
programme.desc: The Smurfs befriend a maiden in distress who is betrothed to Gargamel by convincing her father that the foolish wizard is insane.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Magic Rattle: The Smurfs help a fairy queen outwit the evil fairy Fallon who tries to take away her son's magic rattle.

programme.title: All Creatures Great And Smurf
programme.desc: Nat Smurf is convinced he can help all creatures with his healing ways, even the wicked Azrael after he gets his paw caught in a trap. He heals well, but even though he is tempted to stay with the Smurfs, he runs back to Gargamel while leading his old master away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Would Be King: Dreamy yearns to be King after reading a story about them. He falls through a whirlpool while on his ship and finds himself in the land of pokies who think Dreamy is their long-lost King. When he confronts the pokies' enemies, the Norfnags, he finds they aren't fearful at all. Dreamy bumps his head and wakes up to discover it was just a dream, yet finds a jewel in his cap, just like the ones the pokies mine for a living.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's Giant: The evil wizard Gargamel wants to create a monster. A horrible, gigantic creature, an awesome being that is going to destroy all the Smurfs! But Gargamel makes a slight mistake, and the result is going to astonish him and his cat Azrael.

programme.title: The Gargoyle Of Quarrel Castle
programme.desc: In Quarrel Castle, you almost never hear a kind word. Both Selwyn the Warlock and Tallulah, his witch-mate, spend their time quarrelling. Tharp, their pet gargoyle, takes refuge in the Village of Smurfs. But something terrible is going to happen....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Shadow: Accidents do happen. This time it is Jokey Smurf's mistake that ends up with his shadow coming to independent life! And the shadow loves to play practical jokes on the whole population of the Village of the Smurfs...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Shutterbug Smurfs: Handy's latest invention, the Smurfomatic Picture Maker, looks like just the thing to replace Painter's snail's-pace art. But Handy's aerial snaps of Smurf Village fall into Gargamel's hands. The Smurfs' only hope is to lead him astray.

programme.title: It's A Smurfy Live
programme.desc: All the Smurfs yell at Handy when his inventions break down, so he leaves the Village. But when Gargamel uses Handy's abandoned machines to trap Smurfs, Handy realises he can't abandon his friends.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Long Live Brainy: Brainy becomes King of the Trokels by mistake. When Brainy starts giving orders instead of doing what the Trokels want, they decide to overthrow him, which means throwing him over cliff. Brainy learns it takes more than giving orders to make a leader.

programme.title: Pappy's Puppy
programme.desc: A bump on the head wipes out Puppy's memory. Gargamel finds him and decides to train him to hunt Smurfs. Together they capture the Smurflings. Then Gargamel hits Puppy on the head, and he remembers who his real friends are.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Handy's Sweetheart: Handy learns it's better to have smurfed than not to have smurfed at all when he learns his true love is really a mermaid. Can they really live with each other forever?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Time Capsule: As the Smurfs busily build a time capsule for all of their talents, Papa Smurf frantically tries to unravel an ancient Druid riddle before disaster strikes the forest.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Springtime: The wicked wizard Gargamel asks the sorcerer Balthazar for a recipe to capture the Smurfs. It involves kidnapping Mother Nature to stop the arrival of Spring. Luckily, the Smurfs save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfic Games: The Smurfs discover the spirit and joy of friendly competition when they hold their first "Smurfic Games". After a near miss with the troublesome cat Azrael, the Smurfs decide they need to get into better shape. Papa Smurf suggests that the Smurfs tone their bodies as well as sharpen their athletic abilities by inaugurating the "Smurfic Games".

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Pussywillow Pixies: Clumsy Smurf's misadventures take him across a river into Pussywillow Hollow. There he meets the Pixies – charming and shapely beings whose enemies, the Wartmongers, will meet the Smurfs in some unforeseen ways.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: The First Telesmurf
programme.desc: Papa Smurf pours a magic potion over the new Smurf-melon patch, which instantly grows and grows all over the village and forest. The Smurfs use the blossoms as a telephone, but before Gargamel can trace their voices, the flowers turn into melons and telesmurf is no more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hats Off To Smurf: In his search for something new, Vanity dons a Gargamel-made magic hat that transforms his face into a mess. Through trickery, Papa Smurf gets the antidote from the wicked wizard and once more, Vanity is beautiful.

programme.title: No Time For Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy, Brainy, Clumsy, and Smurfette discover the hourglass of time in a cave and due to their bungling, time spins erratically out of control for all of the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Chief Record Smurf: Due to a wild experiment Clumsy is able to store endless knowledge into his memory. Gargamel captures him, trying to unlock Papa Smurf's invisibility formula, but at the last minute, Clumsy tricks him with the wrong ingredients.

programme.title: Good Neighbour Smurf
programme.desc: When Brainy's house burns down, he moves in with his fellow Smurfs and one by one they kick him out because of his meddling.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Little Smurf Confidence: Papa Smurf gives Weakling a special cream to wear that will restore his strength. Shortly after, he is awarded for his daring deeds of strength and his confidence really soars when he realizes the cream is smurfberry jam.

programme.title: Harmony Steals The Show
programme.desc: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life! Papa Smurf demands a jury trial with ghostly jurors and a judge that finds Harmony innocent and Ghost Writer guilty of plagiarism.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hogatha's Hearththrob: Hogatha the witch promises Gargamel a magical whistle if he will introduce her to the warlock of her dreams. But they are both deceived by each other's trickery: Gargamel dresses up as the warlock, and Hogatha's magical whistle is only a birdcall.

programme.title: A Bell For Azrael
programme.desc: Gargamel puts a spell on a bell attached to Azrael's tail that will lead the cat to the Smurfs. Papa Smurf outwits him with a counter-spell that leads the wizard to Big Mouth instead of the tasty Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette For A Day: Hefty dresses like Smurfette to lure an enamored gnome, Piltkin, away from the Smurf Village. They burrow underground and meet a female gnome who falls in love with Piltkin who then casts Smurfette aside for his new heartthrob.

programme.title: The Magic Earrings
programme.desc: Hogatha manages to obtain the magic golden earrings of Sonoria that will enable her to hear Smurfy voices from afar. Following Lazy's snores, she almost reaches the Smurf Village until Harmony's horn-blasts blow in her earrings and she flies home in a rage.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Every Picture Smurfs A Story: The evil Maestro's magical paints have the power to transport his models onto canvas – forever! Papa Smurf directs Painter to switch his paints and before long, Maestro is enshrined in a picture next to his dream girl, Smurfette.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Golden Smurf Award: Hogatha disguises herself as the Golden Smurf Award to catch the Smurfs in order to use them as the main ingredient in her beauty cream. Vanity convinces her to try his recipe and before long, the wicked sorceress is covered with mud and sent careening over the hills into Gargamel's house.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Last Smurfberry: Papa Smurf organizes a crew to sail to Smurfberry Island because Gargamel has killed all of the trees except one to trap the Smurfs. Gargamel follows them, but once more fails to catch them because the Witch of Smurfberry Island sends her nose-eating seagulls after them.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Miracle Smurfer: The Smurfs learn that the mind is more powerful than matter when they are fooled by a quack's outrageously expensive miracle tonic. But Papa Smurf cures the Smurfs of their temporary naiveté and the charlatan of his villainy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All Hallowseve: While out on a mischief-making mission to destroy the Smurfs' Happy Halloween party, Gargamel and Hogatha catch Lazy who has been accidentally turned red by Mother Nature. Papa and the Smurfs help Lazy escape while Mother Nature has Father Time help turn Lazy's red into blue just in time for the Halloween party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Noble Stag: His wicked cousin, Malcolm the Mean, who plans to kill him and mount him in his trophy room, has turned King Gerard into a black stag. The little Smurfs help their friend. When King Gerard is transformed back into his human form, Malcolm becomes imprisoned in the body of the stag.

programme.title: The Whole Smurf And Nothing But The Smurf
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel is able to capture the Smurfette. Now he is going to give her a truth serum and know all of Papa Smurf' secrets… But then Gargamel makes a big mistake and gives the Smurfette a fib formula!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Secret Of Shadow Swamp: Grouchy, the Smurf who hates everything, doubly hates his own birthday party and goes to hide in Shadow Swamp... He is going to meet strange beings and stranger adventures while the other Smurfs search for him...

programme.title: Smurfiplication
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel creates a magic formula that duplicates everything it touches. And surprise! Suddenly there are six Brainy Smurf! This creates a few interesting situations in the Village... And also at Gargamel's!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Traveller: A dragon terrorizes the Village of the Smurfs. To put the dragon to rest, the Smurfs must find the noted Chinese traveler. Fortunately, Papa Smurf is able to understand the strange customs of the stranger, and even to speak a few words.

programme.title: The Man In The Moon
programme.desc: Sick and tired of not being appreciated, the Man in the Moon quits his job and retires on Earth, to the Village of the Smurfs. The absence of a First Quarter Moon wreaks havoc in the customs of the Smurfs, and Mother Nature and Father Time get dragged in...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Pet For Baby Smurf: There is a prize for the cutest pet of a Smurf. Baby Smurf brings a cute, lovely, affectionate Glowing Darling, a pet anybody falls in love with… But this pet is a creation of Gargamel, the evil wizard intent on destroying the Smurfs!

programme.title: Symbols Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf desperately wants to be more like Papa Smurf. Can a hair tonic be the answer? Can Gargamel be able to finally capture the Smurfs? Does wisdom really reside in a beard?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Gingerbread Smurfs: Brainy feels up to the occasion when he starts the recipe for cookies. He is sure to win the contest: he borrowed a recipe from Papa Smurf's Book of Magic. But a big surprise, and some nasty happenings, await poor Brainy... and the whole Village.

programme.title: Secret Of The Village Well
programme.desc: Why is Clumsy Smurf waiting day and night near the Village well? What is the wish that he wants to be kept secret? How is Gargamel going to be mixed up in this mysterious affair? Is Gargamel going to catch the Smurfs at last?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Float Full Of Smurfs: The Smurfs must find a bunny family to pull their float in the Autumn Carnival. Gargamel sees his chance to capture the little blue people and disguises himself as a giant bunny. Is he going to catch all the Smurfs in one fell swoop?

programme.title: Stop And Smurf The Roses
programme.desc: Wicked Chlorhydris, the sorceress, wants to destroy all love and beauty on Earth. She has to annihilate Wood Elf Grove, where the loving mute elf Laconia cares for the wild flowers. But the Smurfs are there to save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Stealing Grandpa's Thunder: The nasty Stalker, who traps wild animals and sells them, has Grandpa and Wild in his clutches. Nanny and Smoogle come to the rescue, catching the Stalker in one of his own traps.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf The Presses: Reporter writes that Gargamel wants to be friends with the Smurfs, after hearing something out of context. Gargamel talks Reporter into taking him to Smurf Village to make his announcement in person. When Gargamel kidnaps the Smurfs, it's up to Reporter to write them out of a tight corner.

programme.title: Bungling Babysitters
programme.desc: While Handy, Brainy, and Greedy argue, Hogatha kidnaps Baby for her Formula for baby-soft skin. It's up to the quarrelling trio, plus Smoogle, to rescue Baby from Hogatha's clutches.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Bigmouth's Roommate: Gargamel throws Scruple out, so he moves in with Bigmouth. When the Smurflings help Bigmouth throw a party, Scruple captures them to get into Gargamel's good graces again. But he doesn't count on Bigmouth coming to the rescue.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Incredible Shrinking Wizard: Gargamel has thrown in his slime pond so much poisonous muck that the water becomes enchanted and Gargamel, after falling in, suddenly finds himself much smaller that he would wish. Actually he is going to be so small that Papa Smurf will save him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Circus For Baby: It must be a coincidence: just as an elephant crosses the forest and meets baby Smurf, the Smurfs decide to create a big Smurf Circus. They are going to meet the infernal sorcerer Balthazar and Baby Smurf will have a lot of fun...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hopping Cough Smurfs: The evil wizard Gargamel spreads the forest with the germs of the uncontrollable hopping cough. Baby Smurf is the first victim and all the Village of the Smurfs goes frantic with worry... Fortunately, Papa Smurf thinks there might be a cure.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Master Smurf: There is an evil power in the Titan's crown that Miner Smurf finds underground. And Greedy Smurf is the Smurf to fall victim to it. Then Gargamel comes up with some new schemes to destroy the Smurfs, and everything gets hopelessly tangled.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: The First Telesmurf
programme.desc: Papa Smurf pours a magic potion over the new Smurf-melon patch, which instantly grows and grows all over the village and forest. The Smurfs use the blossoms as a telephone, but before Gargamel can trace their voices, the flowers turn into melons and telesmurf is no more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hats Off To Smurf: In his search for something new, Vanity dons a Gargamel-made magic hat that transforms his face into a mess. Through trickery, Papa Smurf gets the antidote from the wicked wizard and once more, Vanity is beautiful.

programme.title: No Time For Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy, Brainy, Clumsy, and Smurfette discover the hourglass of time in a cave and due to their bungling, time spins erratically out of control for all of the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Chief Record Smurf: Due to a wild experiment Clumsy is able to store endless knowledge into his memory. Gargamel captures him, trying to unlock Papa Smurf's invisibility formula, but at the last minute, Clumsy tricks him with the wrong ingredients.

programme.title: Good Neighbour Smurf
programme.desc: When Brainy's house burns down, he moves in with his fellow Smurfs and one by one they kick him out because of his meddling.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Little Smurf Confidence: Papa Smurf gives Weakling a special cream to wear that will restore his strength. Shortly after, he is awarded for his daring deeds of strength and his confidence really soars when he realizes the cream is smurfberry jam.

programme.title: Harmony Steals The Show
programme.desc: Harmony unwittingly signs a contract with Ghost Writer for a symphony that imprisons him in a ghostly nightclub for life! Papa Smurf demands a jury trial with ghostly jurors and a judge that finds Harmony innocent and Ghost Writer guilty of plagiarism.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Hogatha's Hearththrob: Hogatha the witch promises Gargamel a magical whistle if he will introduce her to the warlock of her dreams. But they are both deceived by each other's trickery: Gargamel dresses up as the warlock, and Hogatha's magical whistle is only a birdcall.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: A vengeful crime boss forms an unlikely partnership with a detective, to catch the elusive serial killer who attacked him.

programme.title: The Naked Spur
programme.desc: Howard Kemp (James Stewart) has been tracking killer Ben Vandergroat (Robert Ryan) for a long time. In the Colorado Rockies, he teams up with prospector Jesse Tate (Millard Mitchell) and former Union soldier Roy Anderson (Ralph Meeker). Thinking Kemp is a sheriff, they agree to help for a small fee. When they catch Vandergroat, he tells them Kemp is pursuing a $5,000 bounty. After demanding equal shares, the uneasy alliance heads for Kansas as Vandergroat tries to turn them against each other.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: Gone With the Wind
programme.desc: Presented as originally released in 1939. Includes themes and character depictions which may be offensive and problematic to contemporary audiences. Epic Civil War drama focuses on the life of petulant Southern belle Scarlett O'Hara. Starting with her idyllic life on a sprawling plantation, the film traces her survival through the tragic history of the South during the Civil War and Reconstruction, and her tangled love affairs with Ashley Wilkes and Rhett Butler.

programme.title: Sweet Bird of Youth
programme.desc: After unsuccessfully trying his luck in Hollywood, charming gigolo Chance Wayne (Paul Newman) wanders back to his hometown, accompanied by Alexandra Del Lago (Geraldine Page), a movie star on the wane. Chance quickly falls back into his old rut -- he's still smitten with his former sweetheart, Heavenly Finley (Shirley Knight), but her thuggish brother (Rip Torn) and her crooked politician father (Ed Begley) both hate him. When Alexandra leaves town, Chance is left with little more than trouble.

programme.title: Raintree County
programme.desc: When Southern belle Susanna Drake (Elizabeth Taylor) visits Indiana, she falls for John Wickliff Shawnessy (Montgomery Clift), an abolitionist with strong ideals. However, John falters while he lets Drake tempt him away from his true love, Nell Gaither (Eva Marie Saint). After Drake deceives John into marriage, the two move to her New Orleans household, where he discovers that mental illness runs in her family. When the Civil War begins, John uses it to escape from the unhappy marriage.

programme.title: The Gangster, the Cop, the Devil
programme.desc: A vengeful crime boss forms an unlikely partnership with a detective, to catch the elusive serial killer who attacked him.

programme.title: The Naked Spur
programme.desc: Howard Kemp (James Stewart) has been tracking killer Ben Vandergroat (Robert Ryan) for a long time. programme.title: The Brink
programme.desc: A reckless police inspector is on a mission to crack down on a criminal's gold smuggling scheme.

programme.title: The Spy Gone North
programme.desc: A South Korean army major poses as a businessman to infiltrate a North Korean nuclear facility in 1993.

programme.title: The Fastest Gun Alive
programme.desc: Former gunslinger George Temple (Glenn Ford) wants to keep his gun-fighting days a secret as he builds a new life. It seems whenever Temple's prowess with a gun is discovered, he and his wife, Dora (Jeanne Crain), have to skip town before someone challenges him to a duel. After eventually settling in a small town as a quiet shopkeeper, a drunken Temple makes the mistake of showing off his skills. When the criminal Vinnie Harold (Broderick Crawford) catches wind of it, a showdown is imminent.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: After his childhood buddy is murdered while visiting Detroit, rebellious cop Axel Foley (Eddie Murphy) follows the leads to Beverly Hills, Calif., under the auspices of a vacation. He checks in with old friend Jenny Summers (Lisa Eilbacher) and starts to believe her boss, art dealer Victor Maitland (Steven Berkoff), might somehow be involved in the murder. However, Lt. Bogomil (Ronny Cox) of the Beverly Hills Police Department does not trust Foley, and hinders his search for evidence.

programme.title: Human Capital
programme.desc: The lives of two families collide when their children begin a relationship and it leads to a tragic accident.

programme.title: Coin Locker Girl
programme.desc: Abandoned as a baby in a subway locker, Il-Young becomes an enforcer for a woman known as Mother. While on another assignment, Il-Young meets Suk-hyun, the son of a debtor, and develops unfamiliar feelings toward the world outside China Town.

When Alexandra leaves town, Chance is left with little more than trouble.

programme.title: I'll Take Your Dead
programme.desc: A man who disposes of bodies for gangsters in a nearby city faces a difficult decision when one of the corpses turns out to still be alive.

Bogomil (Ronny Cox) of the Beverly Hills Police Department does not trust Foley, and hinders his search for evidence.

programme.title: Love Me or Leave Me
programme.desc: During the 1920s, a small-time Chicago criminal, Martin Snyder (James Cagney), discovers a beautiful dancer, Ruth Etting (Doris Day), after she's fired from her job at a nightclub. Under Martin's management, Ruth works her way to the top of the entertainment industry, eventually becoming a famous jazz singer and Broadway actress. But as Ruth's popularity grows, Martin's obsessive and controlling behavior begins to threaten her success and happiness.

programme.title: They Died With Their Boots On
programme.desc: George Armstrong Custer (Errol Flynn) is a rebellious but ambitious soldier, eager to join the Civil War. During the war, Custer has numerous successes to his credit, even though he disobeys orders. After the war concludes, he marries Libby Bacon (Olivia de Havilland) and is assigned to the Dakota Territory. Custer negotiates honestly with the Sioux on land, but due to corruption from others, a battle with Sitting Bull's forces occurs at Little Big Horn.

programme.title: Happiest Season
programme.desc: A young woman agrees to go home with her girlfriend for Christmas, but discovers she hasn't come out to her conservative parents.

programme.title: The Teahouse of the August Moon
programme.desc: In the months immediately after the end of World War II, the U.S. Army has occupied the island of Okinawa, Japan, and is trying to Westernize the local population. Hapless Captain Fisby (Glenn Ford) wants to do good by creating a social club and schoolhouse, but the villagers would rather have a teahouse, complete with geishas. The situation looks like a standoff, until the wily, philosophical interpreter Sakima (Marlon Brando) offers his services as a go-between.

programme.title: Coin Locker Girl
programme.desc: Abandoned as a baby in a subway locker, Il-Young becomes an enforcer for a woman known as Mother. While on another assignment, Il-Young meets Suk-hyun, the son of a debtor, and develops unfamiliar feelings toward the world outside China Town.

programme.title: Citizen Kane
programme.desc: Enigmatic newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane (Orson Welles) rises, falls and leaves behind a riddle with his dying breath.

programme.title: I'll Take Your Dead
programme.desc: A man who disposes of bodies for gangsters in a nearby city faces a difficult decision when one of the corpses turns out to still be alive.

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
programme.desc: Gentle Dr. Jekyll (Spencer Tracy) tests a serum on himself, releasing vicious alter-ego Mr. Hyde on 19th-century London. Prowling the town, Hyde ventures to a music hall and encounters Ivy (Ingrid Bergman), whom he takes forcibly as his mistress.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One

programme.title: They Died With Their Boots On
programme.desc: A chronicle of George Armstrong Custer's military career, from West Point to his final battle at Little Bighorn.

programme.title: Happiest Season
programme.desc: A young woman agrees to go home with her girlfriend for Christmas, but discovers she hasn't come out to her conservative parents.

programme.title: The Teahouse of the August Moon
programme.desc: A wily native interpreter (Marlon Brando) foils an Army captain's (Glenn Ford) attempts to change a postwar Okinawan village.

programme.title: Madame Bovary
programme.desc: A woman's unquenchable thirst for romance ultimately proves to be her undoing. Based on Gustave Flaubert's novel.

programme.title: Life in a Year
programme.desc: Daryn, a high-school track star, scholar and aspiring rapper, learns that his girlfriend is sick. He soon plans to give her a life's worth of experiences in the last year she has left, and what he receives in return will last him a lifetime.

programme.title: Auntie Mame
programme.desc: A bohemian socialite (Rosalind Russell) survives the market crash of 1929, marries a millionaire (Forrest Tucker) and teaches her nephew how to live.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: When his boss is killed, Detroit cop Alex Foley (Eddie Murphy) finds evidence that the murderer had ties to a California amusement park called Wonder World. Returning to Beverly Hills once more, Foley reunites with Detective Billy Rosewood (Judge Reinhold) to solve the case. Along with Billy's new partner, Jon Flint (Héctor Elizondo), they discover that the security force of Wonder World is actually part of a counterfeit money operation headed by park manager Orrin Sanderson (John Saxon).

programme.title: Citizen Kane
programme.desc: When a reporter is assigned to decipher newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane's (Orson Welles) dying words, his investigation gradually reveals the fascinating portrait of a complex man who rose from obscurity to staggering heights. Though Kane's friend and colleague Jedediah Leland (Joseph Cotten), and his mistress, Susan Alexander (Dorothy Comingore), shed fragments of light on Kane's life, the reporter fears he may never penetrate the mystery of the elusive man's final word, "Rosebud."

programme.title: The First King
programme.desc: Two brothers working as shepherds embark on a journey that leads them to found a nation.

programme.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
programme.desc: Gentle Dr. Jekyll (Spencer Tracy) experiments with human nature, believing that each person has both good and evil sides that can be brought forth chemically. Jekyll tests a serum on himself, releasing his vicious alter ego, Mr. Hyde, on 19th-century London. Prowling the town, Hyde ventures to a music hall and encounters Ivy (Ingrid Bergman), whom he takes forcibly as his mistress. When the serum's effects wear off, Jekyll vows never to take it again. But Hyde is not gone for good.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Madame Bovary
programme.desc: Based on the French literary classic, this drama presents author Gustave Flaubert (James Mason) narrating his tale of infidelity and narcissism. After marrying small-town doctor Charles Bovary (Van Heflin), Emma (Jennifer Jones) becomes tired of her limited social status and begins to have affairs, first with the young Leon Dupuis (Christopher Kent) and later with the wealthy Rodolphe Boulanger (Louis Jourdan). Eventually, however, her self-involved behavior catches up with her.

programme.title: Life in a Year
programme.desc: Daryn, a high-school track star, scholar and aspiring rapper, learns that his girlfriend is sick. He soon plans to give her a life's worth of experiences in the last year she has left, and what he receives in return will last him a lifetime.

programme.title: Auntie Mame
programme.desc: Mame Dennis (Rosalind Russell), a progressive and independent woman of the 1920s, is left to care for her nephew Patrick (Jan Handzlik/Roger Smith) after his wealthy father dies. Mr. Babcock (Fred Clark), Patrick's assigned executor, objects to Mame's unconventional way of living and tries to force her to send Patrick to prep school. As Mame and Patrick grow closer, Mr. Babcock tries to discipline Patrick and threatens to separate the two if Mame does not comply with his wishes.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: When his boss is killed, Detroit cop Alex Foley (Eddie Murphy) finds evidence that the murderer had ties to a California amusement park called Wonder World. Returning to Beverly Hills once more, Foley reunites with Detective Billy Rosewood (Judge Reinhold) to solve the case. Along with Billy's new partner, Jon Flint (Héctor Elizondo), they discover that the security force of Wonder World is actually part of a counterfeit money operation headed by park manager Orrin Sanderson (John Saxon).

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: A tough cop (Jason Statham) goes after a serial killer who targets police officers.

programme.title: Sergeant York
programme.desc: Prize-winning Tennessee marksman Alvin York (Gary Cooper), a recent convert to Christianity, finds himself torn between his non-violent beliefs and his desire to serve his country when recruited to fight in World War I. Kindly Major Buxton (Stanley Ridges) convinces York to engage in battle, where the pacifist's prowess with a rifle earns him honors as he continues to struggle with his decision to kill. Howard Hawks directs this adaptation of the real York's memoirs.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Charming scoundrel Johnnie Aysgarth (Cary Grant) woos wealthy but plain Lina McLaidlaw (Joan Fontaine), who runs away with him despite the warnings of her disapproving father (Cedric Hardwicke). After their marriage, Johnnie's risky financial ventures cause Lina to suspect he's becoming involved in unscrupulous dealings. When his dear friend and business partner, Beaky (Nigel Bruce), dies under suspicious circumstances on a business trip, she fears her husband might kill her for her inheritance.

programme.title: Dodge City
programme.desc: In 1872, Dodge City, Kansas is the epicenter of cattle drives and lawlessness. Run by Jeff Surrett (Bruce Cabot), Dodge City isn't safe for anyone or anything. When Wade Hatton (Errol Flynn) arrives for a cattle drive, he's moved by the violent death of a young boy to take up the post of sheriff and take back the town from Surrett and his cohorts. But first he must contend with the rowdy townsfolk who, having been so long without law, desire to take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: The First King
programme.desc: Two brothers working as shepherds embark on a journey that leads them to found a nation.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: "Meet Me in St. Louis" is a classic MGM romantic musical comedy that focuses on four sisters (one of whom is the nonpareil Judy Garland) on the cusp of the 1904 St. Louis World's Fair. The film spotlights the sisters' education in the ways of the world, which includes, but isn't limited to, learning about life and love, courtesy of the prototypical boy next door. In the end, love -- accompanied by song, dance and period costumes, all in glorious Technicolor -- conquers all.

programme.title: Burn
programme.desc: Melinda is a lonely and unstable gas-station attendant who's tired of being overshadowed by her more confident and outgoing co-worker. When a robber holds up the station at gunpoint, Melinda tries to make a connection with the desperate thief.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: Needing money to cover his wife's medical bills, a decorated veteran teams up with his adoptive brother to steal $32 million from a Los Angeles bank. However, when their getaway goes spectacularly wrong, the desperate thieves hijack an ambulance that's carrying a severely wounded cop and an EMT worker. Caught in a high-speed chase, the two siblings must figure out a way to outrun the law while keeping their hostages alive.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: After the members of a team of scientists (Harold Ramis, Dan Aykroyd, Bill Murray) lose their cushy positions at a university in New York City, they decide to become "ghostbusters" to wage a high-tech battle with the supernatural for money. They stumble upon a gateway to another dimension, a doorway that will release evil upon the city. The Ghostbusters must now save New York from complete destruction.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: After saving New York City from a ghost attack, the Ghostbusters -- a team of spirit exterminators -- is disbanded for demolishing parts of the city during the battle. But when Ghostbuster Peter Venkman (Bill Murray) learns that spirits have taken an interest in his son, the men launch a rogue ghost-chasing mission. The quest quickly goes awry, landing them in court. But when the ghosts turn on the judge, he issues an order allowing the Ghostbusters to get back to work.

programme.title: Cocaine Bear
programme.desc: An oddball group of cops, criminals, tourists and teens converges in a Georgia forest after a 500-pound black bear ingests a large amount of cocaine and goes on a drug-fueled rampage.

programme.title: Firestarter
programme.desc: A couple desperately try to hide their daughter, Charlie, from a shadowy federal agency that wants to harness her unprecedented gift for turning fire into a weapon of mass destruction. Her father taught her how to defuse her power, but as Charlie turns 11, the fire becomes harder and harder to control. When a mysterious operative finally finds the family, he tries to seize Charlie once and for all -- but she has other plans.

programme.title: Belfast
programme.desc: A 9-year-old boy experiences love, laughter and loss as he comes of age amid the music and social tumult of the late 1960s.

programme.title: Overserved With Lisa Vanderpump
programme.desc: Lisa transforms her olive grove for a trip to Greece, complete with a 10-dish feast and an Olympic game; fearless guests Steve-O and Margaret Cho serve up unexpected moments, like highly inappropriate temporary tattoos.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler gives detailed messages to Ross Mathews from his late father; Jodie Sweetin gets validation from her departed grandmother; Margret Cho gets an unexpected visit from beyond by a comedy legend; Jillian Rose Reed is left speechless.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler makes a tearful connection for Amber Rose and her mother; Heather and Terry Dubrow receive a message from a rock star brother who died of a drug overdose; Tyler helps bring closure to Cheryl Burke.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: A murdered child reaches out via Tyler to reconnect with Tracey Gold; Tyler makes a connection to lost loved ones with WWE Diva Natalya Neidhart; Michael Sam gets insight from Tyler; Christopher Knight has an emotionally charged awakening.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler gives a life-changing message to Joey, Matthew and Andrew Lawrence from their departed grandmother; Tyler is star struck as he channels a friend whose tragic death still haunts Candis Cayne; Tyler connects with Loni Love's deceased loved ones.

programme.title: Hollywood Medium With Tyler Henry
programme.desc: Tyler sees a mysterious woman in Terrell Owens's love life; Fairuza Balk has a shocking connection to her recently departed brother; Olivia Culpo is awe struck by her first psychic reading; a warning and message of hope for Carnie Wilson.

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: Needing money to cover his wife's medical bills, a decorated veteran teams up with his adoptive brother to steal $32 million from a Los Angeles bank. However, when their getaway goes spectacularly wrong, the desperate thieves hijack an ambulance that's carrying a severely wounded cop and an EMT worker. Caught in a high-speed chase, the two siblings must figure out a way to outrun the law while keeping their hostages alive.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Tiffany travels to Derrick Lake to celebrate her 18th birthday at a Halloween frat party in the middle of the woods. Frantic and worried, Madea, Aunt Bam and Hattie hop in the car to save her from the same terrible fate that befell a group of teens there years earlier. Chaos soon strikes when the would-be heroes find themselves fighting for their lives against an array of spooky monsters, goblins and boogeymen.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: After the members of a team of scientists (Harold Ramis, Dan Aykroyd, Bill Murray) lose their cushy positions at a university in New York City, they decide to become "ghostbusters" to wage a high-tech battle with the supernatural for money. They stumble upon a gateway to another dimension, a doorway that will release evil upon the city. The Ghostbusters must now save New York from complete destruction.

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
programme.desc: After saving New York City from a ghost attack, the Ghostbusters -- a team of spirit exterminators -- is disbanded for demolishing parts of the city during the battle. But when Ghostbuster Peter Venkman (Bill Murray) learns that spirits have taken an interest in his son, the men launch a rogue ghost-chasing mission. The quest quickly goes awry, landing them in court. But when the ghosts turn on the judge, he issues an order allowing the Ghostbusters to get back to work.

programme.title: Cocaine Bear
programme.desc: An oddball group of cops, criminals, tourists and teens converges in a Georgia forest after a 500-pound black bear ingests a large amount of cocaine and goes on a drug-fueled rampage.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Boo 2! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Tiffany travels to Derrick Lake to celebrate her 18th birthday at a Halloween frat party in the middle of the woods. Frantic and worried, Madea, Aunt Bam and Hattie hop in the car to save her from the same terrible fate that befell a group of teens there years earlier. Chaos soon strikes when the would-be heroes find themselves fighting for their lives against an array of spooky monsters, goblins and boogeymen.

programme.title: The Rage: Carrie 2
programme.desc: When her closest friend commits suicide after being manipulated by the popular crowd, quiet and bookish Rachel Lang (Emily Bergl) decides to get back at the guilty parties. Although Rachel falls for sensitive football player Jesse Ryan (Jason London), she remains determined to punish his callous friends. When Rachel discovers that she has superhuman abilities, it ups the stakes for her revenge, echoing a supernatural incident that occurred decades before.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 3
programme.desc: A sergeant and his task force embark on a mission to destroy the Creeper on its last day of feeding. The Creeper soon fights back when they get close to discovering its mysterious and dark origins.

programme.title: Growing Up Chrisley
programme.desc: Chase wants to deepen his relationship with Emmy and decides to take things to the next level; Savannah's recent trauma has her burying her head in work and missing out on life.

programme.title: Dolittle
programme.desc: Dr. John Dolittle lives in solitude behind the high walls of his lush manor in 19th-century England. His only companionship comes from an array of exotic animals that he speaks to on a daily basis. But when young Queen Victoria becomes gravely ill, the eccentric doctor and his furry friends embark on an epic adventure to a mythical island to find the cure.

programme.title: Mrs. Harris Goes to Paris
programme.desc: In 1950s London, a widowed cleaning lady falls madly in love with a couture Dior dress, deciding she must have one of her own. After working to raise the funds to pursue her dream, she embarks on an adventure to Paris that will change not only her own outlook -- but the very future of the House of Dior.

programme.title: Trolls World Tour
programme.desc: Poppy and Branch discover that there are six different troll tribes scattered over six different lands. Each tribe is also devoted to six different kinds of music -- funk, country, techno, classical, pop and rock. When rockers Queen Barb and King Thrash set out to destroy the other music, Poppy and Branch embark on a daring mission to unite the trolls and save the diverse melodies from becoming extinct.

programme.title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
programme.desc: Now adults, Tim Templeton is a stay-at-home dad for two adorable daughters, while his estranged brother, Ted, is a big-shot CEO. They come together in an unexpected way when they take a magical formula that transforms them into babies for 48 hours. Joining forces with Tim's secret-agent daughter, they must go under cover to prevent an evil genius from turning fellow toddlers intro monstrous brats.

programme.title: Trolls World Tour
programme.desc: Poppy and Branch discover that there are six different troll tribes scattered over six different lands. Each tribe is also devoted to six different kinds of music -- funk, country, techno, classical, pop and rock. When rockers Queen Barb and King Thrash set out to destroy the other music, Poppy and Branch embark on a daring mission to unite the trolls and save the diverse melodies from becoming extinct.

programme.title: The Bad Guys
programme.desc: After a lifetime of legendary heists, notorious criminals Mr. Wolf, Mr. Snake, Mr. Piranha, Mr. Shark and Ms. Tarantula are finally caught. To avoid a prison sentence, the animal outlaws must pull off their most challenging con yet -- becoming model citizens. Under the tutelage of their mentor, Professor Marmalade, the dubious gang sets out to fool the world that they're turning good.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
programme.desc: After burning though eight lives, Puss in Boots sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore all nine.

programme.title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
programme.desc: In the 1970s, young Gru tries to join a group of supervillains called the Vicious 6 after they oust their leader -- the legendary fighter Wild Knuckles. When the interview turns disastrous, Gru and his Minions go on the run with the Vicious 6 hot on their tails. Luckily, he finds an unlikely source for guidance -- Wild Knuckles himself -- and soon discovers that even bad guys need a little help from their friends.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
programme.desc: After burning though eight lives, Puss in Boots sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore all nine.

programme.title: Vergebung
programme.desc: Nachdem Bohannon und der Suchtrupp auf die Cheyenne gestoßen sind, die für das Zugunglück verantwortlich waren, kommt es zum Kampf. Pawnee Killer gelingt es in dem Getümmel zwar, in den Wald zu fliehen, doch sein Bruder Joseph verfolgt ihn und tötet ihn schließlich. Elam und Eva sprechen indes über ihre Zukunft und bekommen unerwarteten Besuch.

programme.title: Wir waren Soldaten
programme.desc: Die Schlacht von Ia Drang, die erste große Schlacht des Vietnamkriegs, an der amerikanische Truppen beteiligt waren, aus der Sicht der Soldaten, die an ihr teilnahmen.

programme.title: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Ein Polizist im Ruhestand und sein Bruder, ein Kleinkrimineller, kaufen ein Rennpferd, finden aber ihre Pläne für leichtes Geld verkompliziert, wenn ein Gangster das Pferd stiehlt. Mit Kiefer Sutherland, Anthony LaPaglia.

programme.title: Blindspotting
programme.desc: Die lebenslangen Freunde Daveed Diggs und Rafael Casal übernahmen die Hauptrollen und schrieben gemeinsam das Drehbuch für diese zeitgemäße und hochgradig unterhaltsame Geschichte über Rasse und Klassengesellschaft vor dem Hintergrund einer rapiden Gentrifizierung Oaklands.

programme.title: Goblin
programme.desc: Im Jahr 1831 opferten die Bewohner von Hollow Glen ein missgebildetes Kind, um ihre Ernte zu segnen. Doch aus dem Rauch kam etwas, das so böse und monströs war, dass es die Stadt für immer verfluchte.

programme.title: Interceptor – Phantom der Ewigkeit
programme.desc: Jake wird von Schlägertypen in seiner Nachbarschaft getötet und kehrt als mystische Figur zurück, um Rache zu nehmen.

programme.title: Breaker! Breaker!
programme.desc: Bei dem Versuch, seinen entfremdeten Bruder ausfindig zu machen, gerät ein knallharter LKW-Fahrer in eine Kleinstadt, die offenbar der letzte Ort ist, an dem er vor seinem mysteriösen Verschwinden gesehen wurde. Der Fahrer erfährt bald, dass die Behörden der Stadt mehr mit ihren zwielichtigen Geschäften beschäftigt sind, als sich um die Einheimischen zu kümmern, und er beginnt, ein falsches Spiel zu vermuten.

programme.title: Die Tagebücher Des Kindermädchens
programme.desc: Eine frischgebackene College-Absolventin nimmt einen Job als Kindermädchen in einem versnobten New Yorker Penthouse an, der ihr mehr Erziehungsarbeit abverlangt, als sie sich je hätte vorstellen können.

programme.title: Was Frauen wollen
programme.desc: Ein Werbefachmann erlangt die Fähigkeit, die Gedanken von Frauen zu hören, und nutzt dies zu seinem Vorteil, um bei der Arbeit voranzukommen und das Herz seiner Cheffin zu gewinnen.

programme.title: Auf der Basis von Sex
programme.desc: Die Geschichte von Ruth Bader Ginsburg, ihr Kampf für Gleichberechtigung und die Fälle, die zu ihrer Bestätigung als stellvertretende Richterin am Obersten Gerichtshof der USA führten.

programme.title: Die Tagebücher Des Kindermädchens

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Die frischlackierte Porsche-Karosse wartet bei Lundt in Berlin auf das Motorfinish, während Manni von den Minis Hamburg eine durchgerostete Tür wieder auf Vordermann bringt. Neue Achse und Bremsen, Edel-Felgen - Frischekur für den Bulli in Tom's Roadhouse. In der Roller-Werkstatt der Flying Classics ist heute Abschied angesagt: Die schwarze Vespa kehrt heim zu ihrem italienischen Besitzer.

programme.title: Die Kultschrauber
programme.desc: Die Restaurierung des Porsche 911 ist abgeschlossen. Werkstatt-Chef Thomas Lundt persönlich übernimmt die erste Probefahrt. Leistungsstark und tiefergelegt präsentiert sich auch der top überholte T1 von Tom's Garage. In Hamburg prüft Blechroller-Profi Helge, ob die Vespa-Silberpfeil straßentauglich ist. Fummelig geht's heute bei den Minis Hamburg zu. Die restaurierte Tür muss wieder in den Wagen.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die Dämpfe eines zerbrochenen Thermometers führen zur Erfindung der Fotografie. Radarteile und ein schmelzender Schokoriegel besiegeln den Siegeszug der Mikrowelle. Und als ein potenzielles Herzmedikament in Studien getestet wird, stellt man fest, dass es auf ein anderes Organ viel stärker wirkt. Später wird es unter dem Namen Viagra bekannt.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein dreckiges Labor und ein Urlaub führen zur Entdeckung unserer ersten wirksamen Waffe gegen Bakterien: Penicillin. Die Entschlossenheit eines Wissenschaftlers, die "falsche" Lösung zu testen, beschert uns einen besonders starken Kunststoff. Und aus einem nicht funktionierenden Laser wird die LED-Leuchte.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Als der Schweizer Chemiker Albert Hofmann an einem Kreislaufmedikament forscht, entdeckt er zufällig LSD. Ein deutscher Chemiker hingegen will eigentlich einen Farbstoff herstellen, doch es entsteht hochexplosives TNT. Außerdem spielt ein mit Urin gefüllter Kühlschrank eine Rolle bei der Verbesserung der psychiatrischen Versorgung.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein gescheitertes Blutdruckmedikament und unerwartet starker Haarwuchs bei einer Frau führen zu einem Mittel gegen Glatzen. Ein Versuch, das Kräuseln des Papiers in einem Zeitungsdrucker zu verhindern, beschert uns die Klimaanlage. Und auch Wilhelm Röntgen wurde bei seiner größten Erfindung vom Zufall unterstützt.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein junger Medizinstudent glaubt, dass es einen Zusammenhang zwischen der Kopfform und der Intelligenz seiner Kommilitonen gibt und prägt damit die Neurowissenschaft. Als ein Chemiker im Zweiten Weltkrieg nach transparentem Kunststoff für Zielfernrohre forscht, entdeckt er nebenbei den Sekundenkleber. Und auch das Bier verdanken wir einer Reihe von Zufällen.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein missglückter Versuch, eine Plastiktapete herzustellen, führt zur Erfindung von Luftpolsterfolie. Die Vorstufe eines Mittels zur Blutstillung wird zur Partydroge MDMA, auch bekannt als Ecstasy. Ein Missgeschick im Labor führt zur Entdeckung von Schießbaumwolle. Und ein defektes Satellitenobjektiv verbessert die Brustkrebsvorsorge.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Klebeband spielt eine Rolle bei bedeutendsten Entdeckungen in der Materialwissenschaft des 21. Jahrhunderts. Ein Fehler bei der Herstellung von Bonbons erschafft ein erfolgreiches Abführmittel. Ein wenig erfolgreicher Sekundenkleber beschert uns Post-it-Klebezettel. Und ein Spaziergang im Schnee führt beinahe zum nuklearen Armageddon.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein Metall, das eigentlich für Gewehrläufe entwickelt wurde, ist schon bald aus keiner Küche mehr wegzudenken: rostfreier Stahl. Ein Sack Erde von einer abgelegenen Insel enthält ein Bakterium, das die Alterung aufhält. Und das Entfernen von Kletten aus dem Fell eines Hundes führt zur Erfindung des Klettverschlusses.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Auf der Suche nach einer künstlichen Form von Chinin entsteht zufällig der erste künstliche Farbstoff, Mauvein. Ein gescheitertes Reinigungsmittel führt zur Erfindung von Frischhaltefolie. Bei einem Versuch, Bakterien im Labor zu züchten, wird ein Krebsmedikament entdeckt. Und Krankenschwestern an der Westfront erfinden die Damenbinde.

programme.title: Phänomen Sonnenfinsternis
programme.desc: Im Jahr 2017 fanden zwei Sonnenfinsternisse statt. Millionen von Menschen beobachteten gebannt, wie der Mond die Sonne bedeckte und seinen Schatten auf die Erde warf. Am 26. Februar bedeckte der Mond die Sonne zu mehr als 99 Prozent. In Nordamerika dauerte die totale Sonnenfinsternis vom 21. August 90 Minuten, und der Kernschatten überstrich insgesamt 14 Bundesstaaten.

programme.title: Die Jagd nach der dunklen Materie
programme.desc: Das CERN und die University of California, Santa Barbara sind zusammen auf der Suche nach einer flüchtigen Substanz, die das Universum zusammenhält, wie Physiker und Astronomen glauben: Dunkle Materie. Wie weit ist die Forschung im Bereich der Teilchenphysik vorangeschritten und was kommt als nächstes?

programme.title: Mysteriöses Signal aus dem All
programme.desc: Im Green-Bank-Observatorium tief in den Bergen des US-Bundesstaates West Virginia werden rätselhafte Signale empfangen. Könnte dies ein Hinweis auf die Existenz von Leben und sogar anderen Zivilisationen im All sein? Das größte voll bewegliche Radioteleskop der Welt, mit dem Pulsare, Schwarze Löcher und andere interstellare Phänomene beobachtet werden, soll eine Antwort auf diese Frage geben.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die erfolglose Suche nach einem sichereren Kühlmittel führt zur Erfindung von Teflon, eine beschädigte Lieferkiste zur Erfindung von Dynamit. Eine zufällige Begegnung zwischen dem Hollywoodstar Hedy Lamarr und einem Komponisten ebnet den Weg für WLAN - und Pawlows Hundeexperiment für unsere Handysucht.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Ein fehlgeschlagenes Experiment beschert uns das wichtigste Werkzeug zur Verbrechensbekämpfung. Ständig reißende Arbeiterhosen führen zur Erfindung von Kunststoff. Ein zufälliges Gespräch und ein Wurstgift verändern das Gesicht Hollywoods für immer. Und ein kaputtes Thermometer setzt eine Kette von Ereignissen in Gang, die ein Land vom Kolonialismus befreien.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Durch ungeschicktes Hantieren landet eine Probe auf einem Herd, was zur Entdeckung von vulkanisiertem Gummi führt. Ein Griff nach dem falschen Widerstand beschert uns den Herzschrittmacher. Ein fehlgeschlagenes Experiment führt zu einer sicheren Methode zur Erzeugung von Flammen. Und die Suche nach neuen Galaxien könnte uns mit Außerirdischen in Kontakt bringen.

programme.title: Geniale Zufälle
programme.desc: Die Dämpfe eines zerbrochenen Thermometers führen zur Erfindung der Fotografie. Radarteile und ein schmelzender Schokoriegel besiegeln den Siegeszug der Mikrowelle. Und als ein potenzielles Herzmedikament in Studien getestet wird, stellt man fest, dass es auf ein anderes Organ viel stärker wirkt. Später wird es unter dem Namen Viagra bekannt.

Die Entschlossenheit eines Wissenschaftlers, die "falsche" Lösung zu testen, beschert uns einen besonders starken Kunststoff. Und aus einem nicht funktionierenden Laser wird die LED-Leuchte.

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen Bern 2023: Highglights
programme.desc: Erlebe den Nervenkitzel des Red Bull Seifenkistenrennens 2023 in der Schweiz - wilde Designs, Geschwindigkeit und epische Crashs!

programme.title: Doku: Red Bull Flugtag – Höhenflüge & Bruchlandungen
programme.desc: Selbstgebaute Fluggeräte, waghalsige Piloten: Zwischen genialen Konstruktionen und Klebeband-Fliegern liefert der Red Bull Flugtag jede Menge spektakuläre Starts, harte Landungen und vor allem Spaß!

programme.title: Basketball-Doku: NBA-Wurfchoach Lethal Shooter
programme.desc: Die Geschichte von Chris „Lethal Shooter“ Matthews: einst Basketballprofi, heute gefragtester Wurf-Coach der Welt - Rückschläge, Neuanfänge und das unermüdlichen Streben nach Perfektion.

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen São Paulo 2019: Highlights
programme.desc: Das verrückteste und kreativste Rennen der Welt auf vier Rädern fand 2019 in Brasilien statt, und das passierte beim Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen in São Paulo.

programme.title: Skate Doku
programme.desc: Ryan Sheckler, Jamie Foy und die Crew landen auf dem skate-verrücktesten Kontinent der Welt - Südamerika. Die Pros touren quer durch Brasilien, Argentinien und Chile.

programme.title: Abenteuer-Doku: Höhenweltrekordversuch am K2
programme.desc: Mit dem Gleitschirm überqueren Tom de Dorlodot und Horacio Llorens die gewaltigen Gipfel Pakistans – darunter der sagenumwobene K2. Ein waghalsiger Höhenweltrekordversuch in spektakulärer Kulisse.

programme.title: For Reals (S1 E8): Slacklinen bei Sonnenfinsternis
programme.desc: BMXen auf einem Schiffscontainer, Slacklinen bei Sonnenfinsternis, die Streif bei Nacht bezwingen oder Endurofahren auf einem Vulkan – für Red Bull-Athleten pure Leidenschaft statt Limits!

programme.title: For Reals S1 E7: Mit 246 km/h über die Tower Bridge
programme.desc: Wingsuit-Flüge mit 246 km/h über die Tower Bridge, Slacklinen in schwindelerregender Höhe, Schaukeln unter dem Heißluftballon – „For Reals“ zeigt spektakuläre Stunts aus der Welt von Red Bull.

programme.title: Skate Doku
programme.desc: Ryan Sheckler und weitere Skate-Ikonen sprechen über Skate-Videos als Kulturgut und die harte Arbeit hinter jedem Clip. Zwischen Kreativität, Disziplin und endlosen Versuchen entsteht echte Magie.

programme.title: Best of Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen 2018
programme.desc: Dünne Räder, ein schmaler Radstand und ein hohes Chassis sind ein Rezept für heftige Stürze bei Seifenkistenrennen - und die größten Unfälle des Jahres 2018 sind der Beweis dafür.

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen Litauen 2019: Highlights
programme.desc: Beim Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen 2019 in Kaunas (Litauen) lieferten kreative Teams mit ihren skurrilen, motorlosen Gefährten ein spektakuläres Spektakel – voller Humor und verrückter Ideen.

programme.title: Worldies S1 E11: Adventure
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Worldies S1 E14: 5 bizarre Events des Actionsports
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Red Bull Cape Fear: Zwischen Organisation und Adrenalin
programme.desc: Big-Wave-Surfer Mark Mathews steht vor einer doppelten Herausforderung: Als Teilnehmer und Organisator bringt er eines der gefährlichsten Surf-Events der Welt auf die berüchtigten Wellen vor Sydney.

programme.title: ABC of... Segeln
programme.desc: Von Fachbegriffen bis zu ersten Manövern: Diese Einführung zeigt, was Segeln wirklich erfordert. Technik, Ausdauer und Naturerlebnis verbinden sich zu einem anspruchsvollen Sport.

programme.title: Surf-Doku: Kai Lenny & Kelly Slater auf Hawaii
programme.desc: Kai Lenny formt mit Kelly Slater und Carissa Moore ein Surf-Superteam für den Backdoor Shootout in Pipeline. Danach folgt die XXL-Herausforderung beim legendären „The Eddie“ in Waimea Bay.

programme.title: Doku
programme.desc: Von Ocean Beach bis zum Silicon Valley beheimatet San Francisco eine vielseitige Surferszene. No Contest-Moderator Ashton Goggans stellt einige der legendC$ren Sportler:innen nC$her vor.

programme.title: Ride to the Roots S1 E2: Adriano de Souza
programme.desc: Surf-Weltmeister Adriano de Souza kehrt in seine Heimatstadt Guarujá zurück, um die Geschichte seines Erfolgs beim Gewinn des Weltmeistertitels zu erzählen.

programme.title: Doku
programme.desc: Der preisgekrönte Unterwasserfotograf Jacques de Vos verwirklicht in Norwegen seinen Traum: Freitauchen mit Orcas. Eine faszinierende Begegnung mit den Giganten der Meere in atemberaubender Natur.

programme.title: Zwei Segler und der Traum von Olympia
programme.desc: Seit 2011 kämpfen Alex Maloney und Molly Meech Seite an Seite auf dem Wasser. Ihr gemeinsames Ziel: ein Platz bei den Olympischen Spielen 2020. Der Weg dorthin ist alles – nur nicht einfach.

programme.title: Cliff Diving Film: Rainbow Dive mit Rhiannan Iffland
programme.desc: Die Cliff Diving-Weltmeisterin Rhiannan Iffland reist ins australische Outback, um sich selbst und ihre Liebe zum Cliff Diving wiederzufinden. Dabei entdeckt sie dort noch so viel mehr.

programme.title: Skate Tales S2 E1: Fancy Lad Crew
programme.desc: Die Fancy Lads sind die kreativste Skate-Crew der Welt. Sie verändern das Skateboard-Design, um neue Möglichkeiten für Tricks zu eröffnen. Profi-Skater Madars Apse besucht sie in dieser Folge.

programme.title: Red Bull SoundClash Challenge
programme.desc: Heli Shit! Die Welt steht Kopf mit Jordy im Kunstflug-Heli – und wenn sie ganz nebenbei noch Fragen von Kool Savas beantworten muss, hebt sie endgültig ab.

programme.title: Red Bull SoundClash Challenge
programme.desc: „Übel geil!“ statt Übelkeit: Bozza kriegt gar nicht genug von den Eskapaden der Red Bull Driftbrothers. 1.000 PS, Rauch und Donuts sind anscheinend genau das Richtige für sein Nervenkostüm.

programme.title: Red Bull SoundClash Challenge S1 E3: Badmómzjay in Höhe
programme.desc: In der dritten Challenge des Red Bull SoundClash Camp muss sich Badmómzjay ihrer Höhen- und Platzangst stellen und beweisen, dass sie auch in 3.000 m Höhe einen kühlen Kopf bewahren kann.

programme.title: Red Bull SoundClash Challenge S1 E4: Bozza und Sido
programme.desc: Eiskalte Performance, in jeder Hinsicht: Trotz Höhenangst, Unwetterwarnung und Schneetreiben fragt sich Bozza ganz weit oben, ob er hier wirklich hergehört. King-Level!

programme.title: Red Bull Symphonic
programme.desc: Loredana gewährt exklusive Einblicke in ihre größte musikalische Herausforderung: Bei Red Bull Symphonic performt sie ihre Hits begleitet von einem Symphonieorchester – ein Blick hinter die Kulissen.

programme.title: Musik-Doku: Der Aufstieg des asiatischen HipHops
programme.desc: Sechs Künstler:innen aus ganz Asien erzählen, wie HipHop ihren Weg geprägt hat. Mit dabei: Suboi aus Vietnam, die sogar vor Barack Obama performte – ein Blick auf Asiens kreative Szene.

programme.title: Red Bull Symphonic: Camo & Krooked
programme.desc: Classic meets drum 'n' bass with amazing 175 beats per minute – that's Red Bull Symphonic. The duo behind Camo & Krooked and the classical composer Christian Kolonovits face this challenge together.

programme.title: Rap Duell S1 E1: Celo & Abdi vs. Jamule & Reezy
programme.desc: Rap-Duell-Premiere mit dem Duo Numero Uno, Celo & Abdi, und zwei der Top-Newcomer 2020: reezy & Jamule.

programme.title: Rap Duell S2 E4: Ali Bumaye & Achi vs RebellComedy
programme.desc: Es treffen vier Szene-Größen aufeinander: Ali Bumaye und Achi der Entertainer fordern als A-Team Ususmango und Benaissa Lamroubal, die beiden Stand-up-Comedians von Rebell Comedy, als Team Bruda Was?

programme.title: Red Bull Show 100: Camp Tag 2 mit AUT of ORDA
programme.desc: Tag 2 und die Zeit läuft: AUT of ORDA bekommen Verstärkung im Camp und wagen sich an ein Hip-Hop-Cover.

programme.title: Red Bull Sattelfest: Karneval auf Rädern
programme.desc: 40 Teams, verrückte Tandems & ein wilder Parcours: Bei Red Bull Sattelfest in Düsseldorf gab's Action pur. Kreativität, Performance & Style standen im Fokus – ein Sommerhighlight für 20.000 Fans!

programme.title: Worldies S1 E14: 5 bizarre Events des Actionsports
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen Tokio 2019: Highlights
programme.desc: Die Kreativität erreicht beim Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen 2019 in Tokio neue Dimensionen: Mit viel Liebe zum Detail, völlig neuen Fahrzeugen und jeder Menge Mut will jedes der 50 Teams gewinnen.

programme.title: Worldies S1 E11: Adventure
programme.desc: Angefangen bei der Formel 1 über Klippenspringen bis hin zu allem, was dazwischen liegt - jedes dieser "Top-5"-Videos liefert die unglaublichsten Momente, Events und Athleten aller Actionsportarten!

programme.title: Best of Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen 2018
programme.desc: Dünne Räder, ein schmaler Radstand und ein hohes Chassis sind ein Rezept für heftige Stürze bei Seifenkistenrennen - und die größten Unfälle des Jahres 2018 sind der Beweis dafür.

programme.title: Red Bull Rampage Männer – BIKE
programme.desc: Red Bull Rampage 2025 bringt Big-Mountain-Freeride-Biking auf die Weltbühne. Achtzehn Männer battlen um die beste Bewertung Schau live auf Red Bull TV und sei hautnah dabei.

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen Oslo 2023: Highlights

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: Larry Madowo travels across Nigeria to meet two remarkable storytellers preserving the nation's heritage. In Enugu, heritage specialist Iheanyi Igboko safeguards Igbo traditions through the Centre for Memories, while in Lagos, historian Oludàmólá Adebowale uses digital innovation to archive and celebrate Nigeria's cultural past. Together, they reveal how history, language, and art continue to shape identity and inspire the next generation.

programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: After a wild one-night stand, a successful sports agent watches his perfect life slowly disappear when he discovers the sexy and mysterious woman he risked everything for is a determined police detective who entangles him in her latest investigation. As he tries desperately to put the pieces together, he falls deeper into her trap, risking his family, his career, and even his life.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Scott and Annie Russell couldn't be happier after buying their dream home from a mysterious and lonely widower named Charlie in Napa Valley, Calif. Their newfound paradise soon turns into a living nightmare when Charlie -- still strangely attached to the house -- begins to show up and interfere in their daily lives. When his erratic behavior turns to obsession, the young couple soon find themselves caught up in a violent confrontation that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
programme.desc: Mick Haller (Matthew McConaughey) is a charismatic defense attorney who does business out of his Lincoln Continental sedan. Mick spends most of his time defending petty crooks and other bottom-feeders, so it comes as quite a surprise when he lands the case of a lifetime: defending a Beverly Hills playboy (Ryan Phillippe) who is accused of attempted murder. However, what Mick initially thinks is an open-and-shut case with a big monetary reward develops into something more sinister.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: Clyde Shelton is an honorable family man, until the day his wife and daughter are murdered in a home invasion. He hopes for justice, but a rising prosecutor named Nick Rice cuts a deal with one of the killers in exchange for testimony. Ten years later, that man is found dead.

programme.desc: After music mogul Antoine Sartain's (Isaiah Washington) rappers are murdered, Sgt. Joe Gavilan (Harrison Ford) and police Detective K.C. Calden (Josh Hartnett) start to investigate. Initially distracted -- Joe by his real estate transactions, K.C. by his acting aspirations -- the partners pull together when internal affairs officer Bennie Macko (Bruce Greenwood) starts hounding Joe. The two men prove skilled at police work, but they'll also need help from Joe's psychic gal pal (Lena Olin).

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two friends from Brooklyn (Jerry O'Connell), (Anthony Anderson) are forced to deliver mob money to Australia. Their misadventures begin when one of them places his red jacket on a kangaroo while attempting to snap a picture. When the kangaroo bounces off, they realize the mob money is in the jacket and are forced to give chase through the Outback.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander prepare a daring revolt against the corrupt English crown.

programme.title: Bait
programme.desc: Landing in jail for a petty theft crime, Alvin finds himself sharing a cell with John Jaster, the incarcerated half of the pair of high-tech thieves responsible for the missing gold. His partner, Bristol, is still at large. Alvin wants only to get out of prison and start fresh with his girlfriend, Lisa, and when the Feds, led by U.S. Treasury investigator Clenteen, set him loose on a sketchy deal, he thinks his luck has changed. Alvin has his freedom and the Feds have found their bait.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: For the past year, DEA agent Bobby Trench (Denzel Washington) and U.S. Navy intelligence officer Marcus Stigman (Mark Wahlberg) have been working under cover as members of a narcotics syndicate. The twist: Neither man knows that the other is an undercover agent. When their attempt to infiltrate a Mexican drug cartel and recover millions goes haywire, the men are disavowed by their superiors. Trench and Stigman must go on the run lest they wind up in jail or in a grave.

programme.title: Fire With Fire

Grant Casey (Jon Voight) handpicks him for a dangerous secret mission. Unfortunately, Dunn soon finds out that his assignment is a setup, and he is framed for the murder of the president's wife. Dunn goes on the run from the law with Dr. Constantini (Jill Hennessy), who knows the true identity of the assassin. But Casey will do anything to silence the pair.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night

programme.title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: Ladies' man Darnell Wright (Martin Lawrence) is used to getting his way with women. Although he is committed to marrying his longtime love, Mia (Regina King), he can't help himself when he meets the beautiful and standoffish Brandi (Lynn Whitfield). After bedding and then trying to ditch Brandi, Darnell is in for an unpleasant surprise: the unhinged Brandi is not about to let Darnell dump her, and she will do anything to exact revenge on him for tossing her aside.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge, Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn and Terri, respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Monty (Idris Elba), a mechanic, struggles to make ends meet and raise his three young daughters alone. When his drug-dealing ex-wife wins custody of the girls in court, he enlists the help of Julia (Gabrielle Union), a successful attorney, to get the girls back. Romance unexpectedly blooms between the pair, but the couple must come to terms with their very different lives and find a way to keep Monty's family together.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: After a high-speed car chase, Madea (Tyler Perry) winds up behind bars because her quick temper gets the best of her. Meanwhile, Assistant District Attorney Josh Hardaway (Derek Luke) lands a case that's too personal to handle: that of a young prostitute and former drug addict named Candace (Keshia Knight Pulliam). When Candace winds up in jail, Madea takes the young woman under her protective wing.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) is a charming playboy who doesn't believe in serious relationships. His best friends bet him that if he commits to one woman for one month, he's bound to fall in love. Charlie accepts the seemingly easy challenge, but wasn't expecting to cross paths with the beautiful and mysterious Eva (Cassie Ventura). When Charlie coaxes her into a casual affair, Eva turns the tables on him, forcing the lifelong bachelor to question whether he wants more than just a one-night stand.
