programme.desc: Unpopular nerd Arnie Cunningham (Keith Gordon) buys a 1958 Plymouth Fury, which he names Christine. Arnie develops an unhealthy obsession with the car, to the alarm of his jock friend, Dennis Guilder (John Stockwell). After bully Buddy Repperton (William Ostrander) defaces Christine, the auto restores itself to perfect condition and begins killing off Buddy and his friends. Determined to stop the deaths, Dennis and Arnie's girlfriend, Leigh Cabot (Alexandra Paul), decide to destroy Christine.

programme.title: Misery
programme.desc: After a serious car crash, novelist Paul Sheldon (James Caan) is rescued by former nurse Annie Wilkes (Kathy Bates), who claims to be his biggest fan. Annie brings him to her remote cabin to recover, where her obsession takes a dark turn when she discovers Sheldon is killing off her favorite character from his novels. As Sheldon devises plans for escape, Annie grows increasingly controlling, even violent, as she forces the author to shape his writing to suit her twisted fantasies.

programme.title: Silver Bullet
programme.desc: When a series of unexplained murders occurs in the normally quiet town of Tarker's Mill, the residents decide to hunt down the killer. However, many of these vigilantes end up dead, and those who don't are no closer to finding an assailant. But, when a young wheelchair-using boy named Marty (Corey Haim) encounters a werewolf one night, the pieces begin to come together. Along with his sister and Uncle Red (Gary Busey), Marty begins a mission to capture the werewolf once and for all.

programme.title: Cujo
programme.desc: In this tale of a killer canine, man's best friend turns into his worst enemy. When sweet St. Bernard Cujo is bitten by a bat, he starts behaving oddly and becomes very aggressive. As Cujo morphs into a dangerous beast, he goes on a rampage in a small town. Stay-at-home mom Donna (Dee Wallace) gets caught in Cujo's crosshairs on a fateful errand with her son, Tad (Danny Pintauro). Stuck in their tiny car, Donna and Tad have a frightening showdown with the crazed animal.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Repairmen Val McKee (Kevin Bacon) and Earl Bassett (Fred Ward) are tired of their dull lives in the small desert town of Perfection, Nev. But just as the two try to skip town, they happen upon a series of mysterious deaths and a concerned seismologist (Finn Carter) studying unnatural readings below the ground. With the help of an eccentric couple (Reba McEntire, Michael Gross), the group fights for survival against giant, worm-like monsters hungry for human flesh.

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: Gunned down by Detective Mike Norris (Chris Sarandon), dying murderer Charles Lee Ray (Brad Dourif) uses black magic to put his soul inside a doll named Chucky -- which Karen Barclay (Catherine Hicks) then buys for her young son, Andy (Alex Vincent). When Chucky kills Andy's baby sitter, the boy realizes the doll is alive and tries to warn people, but he's institutionalized. Now Karen must convince the detective of the murderous doll's intentions, before Andy becomes Chucky's next victim.

programme.title: Halloween III: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Hospital emergency room Dr. Daniel "Dan" Challis (Tom Atkins) and Ellie Grimbridge (Stacey Nelkin), the daughter of a murder victim, uncover a terrible plot by small-town mask maker Conal Cochran (Dan O'Herlihy), a madman who's planning a Halloween mass murder utilizing an ancient Celtic ritual. The ritual involves a boulder stolen from Stonehenge, the use of Silver Shamrock masks and a triggering device contained in a television commercial -- all designed to kill millions of children.

programme.title: Halloween 4: The Return of Michael Myers
programme.desc: The apparently comatose Michael Myers (George P. Wilbur) is being transferred from one hospital to another, but he wakes up when the ambulance crew talk about his surviving niece, Jamie (Danielle Harris). After slaughtering his attendants, Myers sets out to find his one living relative who is, fortunately, being cared for by a kind and resourceful foster sister named Rachel (Ellie Cornell). Meanwhile, the ever-cautious Dr. Loomis (Donald Pleasence) remains on the killer's path.

programme.title: Halloween 5: The Revenge of Michael Myers
programme.desc: After lying in a coma for a year, Michael Myers (Donald L. Shanks) awakens and stalks his way back to his small hometown in Illinois, intent on killing his niece, Jamie (Danielle Harris), who has been confined to a mental institution since Michael's last attempt to slay her. Suspecting a psychic link between Michael and Jamie, psychiatrist Dr. Sam Loomis (Donald Pleasence) joins forces with Sheriff Ben Meeker (Beau Starr) and attempts to stop Michael's latest rampage.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Nearly two decades after being committed to a mental institution for killing his stepfather and older sister, Michael Myers breaks out, intent on returning to the town of Haddonfield, Ill. He arrives in his hometown on Halloween with the indomitable purpose of hunting down his younger sister, Laurie. The only thing standing between Michael and a Halloween night of bloody carnage is psychologist Dr. Samuel Loomis.

programme.title: Halloween II
programme.desc: After failing to kill stubborn survivor Laurie (Jamie Lee Curtis) and taking a bullet or six from former psychiatrist Dr. Sam Loomis (Donald Pleasence), Michael Myers (Jonathan Prince) has followed Laurie to the Haddonfield Memorial Hospital, where she's been admitted for Myers' attempt on her life. The institution proves to be particularly suited to serial killers, however, as Myers cuts, stabs and slashes his way through hospital staff to reach his favorite victim.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: On a cold Halloween night in 1963, six year old Michael Myers brutally murdered his 17-year-old sister, Judith. He was sentenced and locked away for 15 years. But on October 30, 1978, while being transferred for a court date, a 21-year-old Michael Myers steals a car and escapes Smith's Grove. He returns to his quiet hometown of Haddonfield, Illinois, where he looks for his next victims.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Our heroes fight to protect the people they love.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Our heroes fight to protect the people they love.

Mike Enslin (John Cusack) is a successful author who enjoys worldwide acclaim debunking supernatural phenomena -- before he checks into the Dolphin Hotel, that is. Ignoring the warnings of the hotel manager (Samuel L. Jackson), he learns the meaning of real terror when he spends the night in a reputedly haunted room.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A gadget salesman is looking for a special gift for his son and finds one at a store in Chinatown. The shopkeeper is reluctant to sell him the "mogwai" but sells it to him with the warning to never expose him to bright light, water, or to feed him after midnight. All of this happens and the result is a gang of gremlins that decide to tear up the town on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Children of the Corn II: The Final Sacrifice
programme.desc: A newsman (Terence Knox) and his son (Paul Scherrer) snoop around a Nebraska town where children kill many adults.

programme.title: Stephen King's It
programme.desc: In 1960, seven preteen outcasts fight an evil demon that poses as a child-killing clown. Thirty years later, they reunite to stop the demon once and for all when it returns to their hometown.

programme.title: Stephen King's It
programme.desc: In 1960, seven preteen outcasts fight an evil demon that poses as a child-killing clown. Thirty years later, they reunite to stop the demon once and for all when it returns to their hometown.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part 2
programme.desc: The second entry in the long-running horror series focuses on a group of teenage would-be counselors converging on Camp Crystal Lake for training under the tutelage of head counselor Paul (John Furey). Inevitably, Paul relates the story of Jason Voorhees (Warrington Gillette), a boy who ostensibly drowned at the camp and whose mother murdered a group of counselors in revenge. No one takes the tale seriously until a very much alive Jason begins gruesomely eliminating people.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Against the advice of locals and police, Clay (Jared Padalecki) scours the eerie woods surrounding Crystal Lake for his missing sister. But the rotting cabins of an abandoned summer camp are not the only things he finds. Hockey-masked killer Jason Voorhees lies in wait for a chance to use his razor-sharp machete on Clay and the group of college students who have come to the forest to party.

programme.title: Freddy vs. Jason
programme.desc: Two horror icons face off in this supernatural movie. Disfigured serial killer Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund), who attacks his victims in their dreams, has lost much of his power since citizens of his town have become less afraid of him. Enlisting the help of fellow violent murderer Jason Voorhees (Ken Kirzinger), Freddy orchestrates a new killing spree. However, when the hockey-mask-wearing psychopath won't stop chopping up Freddy's intended victims, the two ghouls start to battle each other.

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Repairmen Val McKee (Kevin Bacon) and Earl Bassett (Fred Ward) are tired of their dull lives in the small desert town of Perfection, Nev. With the help of an eccentric couple (Reba McEntire, Michael Gross), the group fights for survival against giant, worm-like monsters hungry for human flesh.

programme.desc: The Rebels are 6-0 for the first time since 1974 as they visit the 4-2 Broncos. Boise State has won nine straight meetings after beating UNLV 21-7 in the 2024 Mountain West title game. Jai'Den Thomas (UNLV) has rushed for six TDs this season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Terrapins travel to the Rose Bowl to play the red-hot Bruins. UCLA followed up its 42-37 upset of then-No. 7 Penn State by thrashing Michigan State 38-13 on Oct. 11. UCLA's Nico Iamaleava accounted for eight TDs in those victories.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack (1-5, 0-2) try for their third straight victory over the Lobos (3-3, 0-2) in a howling Mountain West match. Nevada leads 6-3-1 in a series that began in 1941. New Mexico tight end Dorian Thomas has caught four touchdown passes in 2025.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The Wolverines (4-2, 2-1 Big Ten) welcome the Huskies (5-1, 2-1) to the Big House. Washington exacted a measure of revenge on Michigan with a 27-17 win in 2024, one season after the Wolverines beat the Huskies 34-13 in the national championship game.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 7 Red Raiders visit the Sun Devils. Texas Tech prevailed 30-22 at home last season in its first meeting with Arizona State since 2017. Cam Skattebo, now starring for the NFL's New York Giants, had 177 yards from scrimmage and two TDs for ASU.

programme.title: College Football

The scrappy fighters must now rely on their wits and weapons more than ever as they soon find themselves in a relentless battle against smarter, faster and seemingly indestructible zombies.

programme.title: According to Jim

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Workaholic real estate agent Jim Evers (Eddie Murphy) is accused by his wife, Sara (Marsha Thomason), of neglecting his son (Marc John Jefferies) and daughter (Aree Davis), so he takes the family on a vacation. Along the way, the family stops off at a sinister mansion that Jim has been asked to sell, only to discover it's haunted by Master Gracey (Nathaniel Parker) ; his stern butler, Ramsley (Terence Stamp) ; and two other servants who need some help breaking a curse.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: When monsters want to get away from it all, they go to Count Dracula's (Adam Sandler) Hotel Transylvania, a lavish resort where they can be themselves without humans around to bother them. On one special weekend, Dracula invites creatures like the Invisible Man, the Mummy and others to celebrate the 118th birthday of his daughter, Mavis (Selena Gomez). However, an unforeseen complication unfolds when an ordinary human unwittingly crashes the party and falls in love with Mavis.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Now that Dracula (Adam Sandler) has opened the Hotel Transylvania's doors to humans, things are changing for the better; however, Drac is secretly worried that his half-human grandson, Dennis, isn't showing his vampire side. So, while Mavis and Johnny are away, Drac enlists his friends to help him put the boy through a "monster-in-training" boot camp. But things really get batty when Drac's cantankerous, old-school dad (Mel Brooks) pays an unexpected visit.

programme.title: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween
programme.desc: While collecting junk one day, best friends Sonny and Sam meet Slappy, a mischievous talking dummy from an unpublished "Goosebumps" book by R.L. Stine. Hoping to start his own family, Slappy kidnaps Sonny's mother and brings all of his ghoulish friends back to life -- just in time for Halloween. As the sleepy town becomes overrun with monsters, witches and other mysterious creatures, Sonny joins forces with his sister, Sam and a friendly neighbor to save mom and foil Slappy's wicked plan.

programme.title: Cruella
programme.desc: Estella is a young and clever grifter who's determined to make a name for herself in the fashion world. She soon meets a pair of thieves who appreciate her appetite for mischief, and together they build a life for themselves on the streets of London. However, when Estella befriends fashion legend Baroness von Hellman, she embraces her wicked side to become the raucous and revenge-bent Cruella.

programme.title: Hocus Pocus

After dismissing a story Allison tells as superstitious, Max accidentally frees a coven of evil witches (Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy) who used to live in the house. Now, with the help of a magical cat, the kids must steal the witches' book of spells to stop them from becoming immortal.

The scientist dies before he can finish assembling Edward, though, leaving the young man with a freakish appearance accentuated by the scissor blades he has instead of hands. Loving suburban saleswoman Peg (Dianne Wiest) discovers Edward and takes him home, where he falls for Peg's teen daughter (Winona Ryder). However, despite his kindness and artistic talent, Edward's hands make him an outcast.

programme.title: Family Guy

programme.title: American Dad!

programme.title: American Dad!

programme.title: Plebs
programme.desc: Cynthia's charming new gladiator boyfriend Cassius impresses everyone except jealous Marcus, who makes it clear that he wants the relationship to fail as soon as possible. Meanwhile, Stylax plays a prank on Aurelius which ends up going a little too far.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal

programme.title: Live: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: From Circuit of the Americas in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: The National Dodgeball League Championship Games
programme.desc: The National Dodgeball League Championship returns as part of the Ocho Show! Don't miss the Men's Finals, featuring some of the world's top dodgeball athletes in this premier U.S. competition.

programme.title: 2025 Extreme Archery Championship
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of Extreme Archery as elite teams from the USA and Canada face off in a fast-paced arena battle with foam-tipped arrows. Dodge, shoot, and strategize -- non-stop action makes this a must-watch for fans of unconventional sports!

programme.title: Slippery Stairs
programme.desc: It's controlled chaos as contestants are challenged with unpredictable steps, slippery slime, dodging balls and the goal of being the first one to the top. Slippery Stairs, wild and fun, returns with new contestants, new stairs and new champions!

programme.title: The Popdarts Championship Presented by APL
programme.desc: From viral sensation to national sport -- four top players battle for $10,000 in a high-stakes competition of skill and precision. Each throw echoes with the pop that started it all. This is more than a game. It's the PopdartsChampionship!

programme.title: The 4th Annual BullShooter Invitational Shootout
programme.desc: Watch as a selection of the world's best darts players battle for glory after a dominant run on the 2024-2025 BullShooter Tour. Who will take the title -- and who will make history in the first-ever Ladies Invitational Bracket?

programme.title: Turf Wars Adult Kickball Tournament
programme.desc: Turf Wars hits ESPN The Ocho for its 4th year! Top kickball teams from around the globe compete in a high-speed, high-stakes showdown packed with big kicks and bold moves.

programme.title: OmegaBall World Invitational
programme.desc: Three-team soccer with no offsides, on a circular pitch. Teams defend their own goal, but can score on the other two, and it's 10x more goals than traditional soccer!

programme.title: 2025 NWLA All-Star Game
programme.desc: Top Wiffle Ball® leagues from across the country come together for the NWLA All-Star Game -- a fast-paced, backyard showdown of elite national talent.

programme.title: Major League Paintball
programme.desc: Watch the Great American Events on ESPN.

programme.title: The Goodyear Blimp Sky Race of the Century
programme.desc: To mark the 100th anniversary of the Goodyear Blimp in 2025, Goodyear brought all three of its U.S. airships to Akron, Ohio for the Sky Race of the Century. While blimps aren't known for speed, this race has no shortage of action.

programme.title: FlingGolf: LFC-5 Longest FlingShot Championship
programme.desc: With FlingSticks and golf balls, top World League FlingGolf Pros battle to outdistance each other and take home the LFC Belt.

programme.title: 2025 National Bubble Gum Blowing Championship
programme.desc: Finalists chew. They blow. They pray it doesn't pop too soon. The biggest unburst bubble wins. One gum blower will be crowned the 2025 Champion. The rest go home sticky and defeated.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Mailboat Jumping
programme.desc: Carriers compete to secure a spot on the historic Mailboat Team, jumping from boat to dock and back again while in motion. It's part timing, part chaos,and a century-old tradition that defines summer. Don't fall in-or do, but don't expect sympathy.

programme.title: Swiss Stone Tossing
programme.desc: Contestants grunt and hurl earth-shaped stones in their natural state -- no polish, no shine. The furthest legal toss without crossing the line takes the win. It's simple, primal, and strangely satisfying.

programme.title: 11th Annual Outhouse Races
programme.desc: Teams build their own custom outhouses -- each equipped with a mandatory toilet seat for the driver and a roll within reach. One outhouse races another, with teams straining to push their rig across the finish line and be crowned Fastest Throne.

programme.title: 2025 Golden Tee Golf World Championships
programme.desc: The world's best Golden Tee players converge at the Palms Casino Resort in Las Vegas to battle for nearly $200,000 in prizes. The stakes are high, the legends are ready -- who will take home the title in the game that helped shape esports?

programme.title: 2025 NESSBIC Finals
programme.desc: Top pinball players from across New England compete to take home the Speedy Silver Ball crown.

programme.title: The 2024 Onewheel World Championship - Race For The Rail
programme.desc: The World Championship Onewheel Racing event featured the best Onewheel riders zooming down Sky Tavern Ski Mountain in a boardercross style event for $10,000. This race took place outside of Reno, Nevada on August 9th, 2024.

programme.title: Roofball - 2025 RFA Cup
programme.desc: Players from around the country compete for Roofball's RFA Cup championship. Played in Lancaster,Ohio, at the first roof ever purpose-built for the game.

programme.title: 2025 World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves
programme.desc: The World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves competition rewards the best waves, champion dog surfers have surfed over the past year.

programme.title: 2025 Corgi Races at Emerald Downs
programme.desc: Get ready for the cutest and most unpredictable event of the year as over 100 Corgis race for the Championship trophy!

programme.title: 2025 T-Rex World Championship Races
programme.desc: It's a race of prehistoric proportion as men, women, children and seniors compete to be the 2025 T-Rex World Champion!

programme.title: 2025 NuLu Bock Fest Goat Racing Championships
programme.desc: NuLu Bock Fest Goat Racing brings new life to a quirky, historic Louisville tradition, once born from travelers racing goats through alleyways as they waited to cross the Ohio River. Ready. Set. Goat!

programme.title: National Putting Tour American Dream's Super Roll of Putting
National Ball Hockey League
programme.desc: Lace up your shoes and hit the rink -- it's hockey like you've never seen it. Catch the fast-paced action of Tier 1 New Jersey teams in the National Ball Hockey League!

programme.title: 2025 Blackbird Cup - Alberta Pro Roller Hockey League
programme.desc: The championship game of the Alberta ProRoller Hockey League (APRHL), highlighting Canada's emerging inline hockey talent, community roots, and diverse player stories.

programme.title: Red Bull Flugtag Cincinnati
programme.desc: Wacky engineers and fearless pilots build human-powered flying machines to take leaps of faith into the Ohio River.

programme.title: Ludvig's Streamer Games
programme.desc: Hosted by Red Bull Player Ludwig Ahgren, this creator-fueled athletic showdown drops popular streamers into a chaotic mix of track-and-field and schoolyard challenges.

programme.title: Diving Chess: Duel in the Depths
programme.desc: Two champions face off in a high-stakes underwater chess match -- where every move is made on a single breath.

programme.title: Freestyle Chess Grand Slam - Paris Final: Best Of Show
programme.desc: ESPN8 presents highlights from the epic final between Magnus Carlsen and Hikaru Nakamura in Paris -- featuring key moments, tactics, emotions, interviews, and the intensity of this groundbreaking chess format.

programme.title: World Series of Armwrestling Finals Season 3
programme.desc: The World Series of Armwrestling brings the top arm wrestlers around the US to compete for over $100,000 in cash and prizes in the largest cash tournament in the world!

programme.title: 360 Hoops Championship
programme.desc: Watch the Great American Events on ESPN.

programme.title: Padel Ping Pong Championship
programme.desc: A mixture of Ping Pong and Squash, this innovative sport creates a creative blend of hand eye coordination, power and finesse. It's the Padel Ping Pong Championship, two on two competition from the sport's birthplace in Sweden.

programme.title: Bottlesbee
programme.desc: A two versus two competition at Tall Ship in Boston, as these world class athletes showcase their hand eye coordination, and the ultimate teamwork coordination, with an inaugural title on the line.

programme.title: Bike Polo
programme.desc: The mastery of polo meets the intensity of biking. Watch as this innovative sport takes to the streets of Brooklyn New York, with City bragging rights on the line.

programme.title: Coffin Wars, Grapple to the Grave
programme.desc: PLN's popular combat sports series presents, Coffin Wars, full-contact grappling inside custom-built coffins,where athletes grapple inside casket-sized cages in a ridiculous-yet-real clash of strength, strategy, and pure un-deadlifted willpower.

programme.title: Tire Wrestling: No Ropes, Just Rubber
programme.desc: PLN's Ultimate Tire Wrestling turns grappling into a dunk contest -- using stacked tractor tires as the rim. Athletes wrestle for control, aiming to lift and slam opponents into the rubber heap in a wild test of balance, brute force, and chaos.

programme.title: The 2025 Big Boy Soap Hockey Tournament
programme.desc: The biggest and baddest soap hockey league in the world faces off in an eight-team, single elimination tournament to win the ultimate prize... the Golden Duck.

programme.title: Donk Toss World Championship
programme.desc: The Donk Toss World Championships is a glorious backyard sport that blends skill, chaos, and comedy. Players toss an inflatable donkey and score points by landing it in funny positions -- on its feet, ears-down, snout-first, or even upside down.

programme.title: NTPA Unlimited Pulling Tractors
programme.desc: NTPA Grand National Unlimited Pulling Tractors from the Wisconsin Dairyland Super Nationals in Tomah, Wis., on June 28, 2025. Unlimited Pulling Tractors are the most powerful motorsports vehicles on the planet!

programme.title: College Football Final
programme.desc: Once the day's slate of college football games is complete, ESPN recaps the action and discusses its implications on the top 25. Matt Barrie hosts with analysts Joey Galloway and Dan Mullen.

programme.title: Formula 1 Racing
programme.desc: The Formula One season enters the stretch run with the United States Grand Prix. McLaren teammates Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris remain atop the standings, but Max Verstappen won two of the last three Grands Prix to make a late charge for Red Bull.

programme.title: Diving Chess: Duel in the Depths
programme.desc: Two champions face off in a high-stakes underwater chess match -- where every move is made on a single breath.

programme.title: Slippery Stairs
programme.desc: It's controlled chaos as contestants are challenged with unpredictable steps, slippery slime, dodging balls and the goal of being the first one to the top. Slippery Stairs, wild and fun, returns with new contestants, new stairs and new champions!

programme.title: The Popdarts Championship Presented by APL
programme.desc: From viral sensation to national sport -- four top players battle for $10,000 in a high-stakes competition of skill and precision. Each throw echoes with the pop that started it all. This is more than a game. It's the PopdartsChampionship!

programme.title: Pop-A-Shot 2025 National Championship
programme.desc: The Pop-A-Shot 2025 National Championship brings together the top qualifiers from across the country. A head-to-head, tournament-style competition and the thrilling finale of the Pop-A-Shot National Series.

programme.title: 2025 Extreme Archery Championship
programme.desc: Experience the thrill of Extreme Archery as elite teams from the USA and Canada face off in a fast-paced arena battle with foam-tipped arrows. Dodge, shoot, and strategize -- non-stop action makes this a must-watch for fans of unconventional sports!

programme.title: Yankees-Dodgers: An Uncivil War
programme.desc: In 1977 and 1978, the New York Yankees and Los Angeles Dodgers squared off in back-to-back World Series. This ESPN Films documentary tells the story of a rivalry filled with colorful characters, seismic controversies and unforgettable moments.

programme.title: E60
programme.desc: ESPN's morning sports magazine show, featuring the biggest names and stories in sports.

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: MLB Productions chronicles the 2004 American League playoff series between the Yankees and Red Sox that made baseball history and finally put an end to the "Curse of the Bambino.".

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption

programme.title: Matlock2024
programme.desc: S1 E2 M.S.C.P.C.F Matty s'installe dans son nouveau rôle chez Jacobson Moore et cherche à gagner la confiance d'Olympia. Celle-ci accepte de défendre un adolescent.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Lorsque Maurice Riva, l’ex-compagnon violent de la mère de Nick Torres, est abattu, Nick est arrêté par le FBI. Le NCIS, qui ne croit pas en sa culpabilité, cherche à l’innocenter avec l’aide de sa sœur, Lucia, et en collaborant avec l’agent Rose, mandatée par le FBI.

programme.title: Matlock2024
programme.desc: S1 E3 On n'est pas amies En piratant les mails de sa patronne avec l'aide de son petit-fils Alfie, Matty met ses compétences d'avocate au service d'une femme accusant son ancien patron de harcèlement.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: À son arrivée au domicile de Ducky pour l'aider sur une de ses enquêtes, Palmer le découvre mort dans son sommeil. Pour honorer la mémoire du légiste et historien du NCIS, l’équipe va reprendre cette enquête inachevée concernant un Marine dont la mort suspecte a entraîné son déshonneur militaire.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: S21 E1 Le jour est venu Lorsque Maurice Riva, l'ex-compagnon violent de la mère de Nick Torres, est abattu, Nick est arrêté par le FBI. L'équipe du NCIS cherche à l'innocenter.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Le meurtre d'un Marine conduit le NCIS à enquêter sur deux frères propriétaires qui étaient en conflit avec leurs locataires. Par ailleurs, Sloane est chargée par Vance de s'assurer du moral de l'équipe après le retour soudain de Ziva.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: S21 E2 Adieu Ducky Palmer découvre Ducky mort dans son sommeil. Pour honorer la mémoire du légiste et historien du NCIS, l'équipe va reprendre une enquête inaboutie.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: S17 E4 L'honneur du soldat Un cheval sans cavalier arrive au galop dans le cimetière national d'Arlington. Ses deux étriers transportent des bottes contenant chacune un pied humain.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: S17 E3 Deux frères pour un crime L'équipe a été très marquée par le passage éclair de Ziva. Chargée de procéder à l'évaluation psychologique des agents, Sloane les reçoit un à un.

programme.title: Capital
programme.desc: E4 Toujours plus pour moins cher : que valent les nouveaux bons plans resto ? Buffets à volonté : les Français ne sont pas rassasiés ! Les restaurants avec des buffets à volonté connaissent un essor et concurrencent même les fast food américains. - Plats tout prêts, frais et pas cher : peut-on se fier aux traiteurs d'hyper ? - Menus à 10 euros : ils font fondre l'addition !

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: E8 Pérou : le Far West à 4000 mètres d'altitude A plus de 4000 mètres d'altitude, l'Altiplano péruvien fascine autant qu'il éprouve ceux qui osent s'y aventurer. Dans ces conditions montagneuses extrêmes, la vie y est difficile. Autour de la ville de La Rinconada, juchée à 5300 mètres, la gigantesque mine d'or avale des milliers de travailleurs.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: E8 Pérou : le Far West à 4000 mètres d'altitude A plus de 4000 mètres d'altitude, l'Altiplano péruvien fascine autant qu'il éprouve ceux qui osent s'y aventurer. Dans ces conditions montagneuses extrêmes, la vie y est difficile. Autour de la ville de La Rinconada, juchée à 5300 mètres, la gigantesque mine d'or avale des milliers de travailleurs.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: Chili, le territoire de tous les extrêmes Des glaciers de la Patagonie au désert d'Atacama, le Chili conjugue tous les extrêmes. C'est aussi un pays méconnu aux richesses minières colossales. Si le Chili est l'un des pays les plus prospères d'Amérique latine, il traverse aujourd'hui une crise sociale et environnementale qui fracture la société.

programme.title: Enquête exclusive

programme.title: Enquête exclusive
programme.desc: E5 Ni taxes, ni Etat : qui sont ces libertariens qui révolutionnent l'Amérique ? Au large du Honduras, l'île de Prospera, mirage high-tech sorti des eaux turquoise, fait office de nouvelle vitrine des libertariens, un mouvement planétaire qui place la liberté individuelle au-dessus de tout. Son crédo : Etat minimal, impôts réduits au strict nécessaire, quasi-absence de règles institutionnelles.

programme.title: L'amour est dans le pré
programme.desc: S20 E9 Dans l'Aveyron, Mathieu reçoit Marie et Clémence. Les deux jeunes femmes savent qu'elles ont tout à apprendre à l'agriculteur, qui n'a jamais connu d'histoires de coeur. Clément et Florent, eux, ont été conviés chez Célia. Pour les deux Jean-Louis, il est sans doute venu le moment de faire un choix.

programme.title: L'amour est dans le pré
programme.desc: S20 E9 Dans l'Aveyron, Mathieu reçoit Marie et Clémence. Les deux jeunes femmes savent qu'elles ont tout à apprendre à l'agriculteur, qui n'a jamais connu d'histoires de coeur. Clément et Florent, eux, ont été conviés chez Célia. Pour les deux Jean-Louis, il est sans doute venu le moment de faire un choix.

programme.title: L'amour vu du pré
programme.desc: S7 Les agriculteurs de la saison 20, avec parmi eux Gilles, Julien, Jean-Louis et Océane, retrouvent les anciens candidats et chacun revit les temps forts de son aventure sentimentale, entouré de ses proches. Les figures des saisons passées sont également de la partie, partageant leur vécu et leur regard sur cette rétrospective pleine de sincérité. Entre éclats de rire, confidences touchantes et instants vrais, il y a toujours de la magie vu du pré.

programme.title: L'amour est dans le pré
programme.desc: S20 E9 Dans certaines exploitations, il est temps pour les agriculteurs de décider auquel de leurs hôtes va leur préférence. Chez d'autres, l'heure est encore à la découverte, et les soupirants doivent redoubler d'attention pour ne pas se faire piéger par leur rival.

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: S20 E2 Les auditions Après un premier épisode qui a mis la barre très haut, place à un deuxième round d'auditions qui risque bien de réserver son lot de surprises. Des artistes venus de tous horizons, des histoires qui bouleversent, des numéros improbables, voilà les ingrédients de "La France a un incroyable talent".

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent
programme.desc: S20 E2 Les auditions Alors que les numéros s'enchaînent pour séduire le jury, les candidats de cette 20e saison de "La France a un incroyable talent" lorgnent également sur les Buzzers, et en particulier sur le rare et précieux Platinium Buzzer, un aller simple et direct pour rejoindre la grande finale.

programme.title: La France a un incroyable talent, ça continue
programme.desc: S20 E2 Juju Fitcats est aux commandes de l'after-show, un rendez-vous fun et toujours surprenant. Au programme : une immersion totale dans les coulisses, les réactions à chaud des candidats, des confidences inédites, les interviews exclusives du jury, des images jamais vues. Rien n'échappe à Juju et ses équipes !

programme.title: Les incroyables talents sont éternels
programme.desc: S19 E2 Retour sur une sélection des meilleurs candidats passés sur la scène de "La France a un incroyable talent" depuis 18 saisons. Durant leur passage, ils ont su faire vibrer le jury et le public grâce à leur talent extraordinaire. C'est l'occasion de redécouvrir d'anciens talents sortis depuis de l'anonymat.

programme.title: Les incroyables talents de la musique
programme.desc: S18 E4 Une sélection des meilleurs chanteurs et artistes vocaux passés sur la scène de La France a un incroyable talent ! Revivez le parcours fabuleux des meilleurs chanteurs et artistes vocaux. Durant leur passage, ils ont su faire vibrer le jury et le public grâce à leur voix extraordinaire… L'occasion de redécouvrir aussi d'anciens talents sortis depuis de l'anonymat.

programme.title: Scènes de ménages
programme.desc: Loin d'être un long fleuve tranquille, la vie de couple est émaillée de conflits, de disputes et de réconciliations, comme en témoigne le quotidien de quatre d'entre eux. Parmi eux, les trentenaires Cédric et Marion, qui se surnomment mutuellement "poussin", les jeunes parents Emma et Fabien, récemment installés à la campagne avec leur petite Chloé, José et Liliane, mariés depuis plus de vingt ans, sans oublier les inénarrables Huguette et Raymond, des retraités à la méchanceté gratuite. Librement adapté de la série espagnole "Escenas de matrimonio", ce programme court évoque avec humour les hauts et les bas de la vie de couple Loin d'être un long fleuve tranquille, la vie de couple est émaillée de conflits, de disputes et de réconciliations, comme en témoigne le quotidien de quatre d'entre eux. programme.title: Scènes de ménages
programme.desc: Après une demande en mariage mémorable, Emma et Fabien préparent le grand jour où ils se diront enfin oui. Camille, forte du succès de son centre de bien-être, pourrait bien finir par détrôner Philippe et ses deux pharmacies. Un tournant professionnel se dessinera également pour José et Liliane : et si après la mairie, il y avait un autre horizon pour José ? Quant à Sofiane et Alice, la frénésie de leur épicerie ne leur laissera aucun repos. Du repos, c'est bien ce qui pourrait faire peur à Léo et Leslie, qui passent le cap des 30 ans. Les couples n'en finissent pas d'étonner les téléspectateurs dans une 17e saison enjouée Après une demande en mariage mémorable, Emma et Fabien préparent le grand jour où ils se diront enfin oui. programme.title: Patron incognito
programme.desc: Pour savoir ce qui se passe vraiment sur le terrain et améliorer l'image de son entreprise, un patron se fait engager une semaine parmi ses employés, incognito Pour préparer l'avenir, Antoine Barat, cofondateur du réseau Eat Salad, s'immerge dans le quotidien de ses équipes en cuisine, au service et en management.

programme.title: Patron incognito
programme.desc: Pour savoir ce qui se passe vraiment sur le terrain et améliorer l'image de son entreprise, un patron se fait engager une semaine parmi ses employés, incognito Derrière une nouvelle identité, Antoine Barat, cofondateur du réseau de restauration rapide Eat Salad, va vivre le quotidien de ses équipes en cuisine, au service et en management.

programme.title: Patron incognito
programme.desc: Pour savoir ce qui se passe vraiment sur le terrain et améliorer l'image de son entreprise, un patron se fait engager une semaine parmi ses employés, incognito Georges Elkouby, patron de Isotoner, une marque de vêtements et de chaussures de pluie à la solide réputation, retourne sur le terrain en mode incognito.

programme.title: Patron Incognito
programme.desc: C’est une marque qui nous chausse, nous gante et nous protège de la pluie depuis plus d’une centaine d’années qui tente l’expérience Patron Incognito : lsotoner. Isotoner est aujourd’hui la 4e marque en France en volume de chaussures vendues, derrière Nike, Adidas et Puma.

programme.title: Patron incognito
programme.desc: Après des mois de fermeture totale, de couvre-feux, de pass sanitaire, de modèle économique transformé par la vente à emporter, quatre patrons ont accepté l'immersion incognito dans leur entreprise. Gagnant du concours Lépine, critique de mode, boule à zéro, ils sont complètement transformés ! Entre ces nouveaux subterfuges et des mises en scène inédites avec des comédiens et guests VIP, les patrons sauront-ils conserver leur anonymat au contact de leurs salariés Arnaud Bruillon, PDG de l'enseigne Finsbury, se rend incognito dans un magasin d'outlet, à Troyes, puis chez un gestionnaire de stock et enfin dans un magasin à Paris.

programme.title: Patron incognito

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: Although they made their way through high school successfully, an investigation at a local college brings big changes for undercover officers Jenko (Channing Tatum) and Schmidt (Jonah Hill). When Jenko meets a kindred spirit on the football team and Schmidt infiltrates the bohemian art-major scene, both men begin to question their partnership. Not only do they have to crack the case, but now the two overgrown adolescents must learn how to behave like adults.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Two years after the disastrous events in Las Vegas, it is now Stu's (Ed Helms) turn to walk down the aisle. Since his bride is from Thailand, Stu decides to hold the wedding there. Desperately hoping to avoid the mayhem of Doug's (Justin Bartha) bachelor party, Stu chooses what he thinks will be a safe option: an alcohol-free, prewedding brunch. But this being Thailand, and with Phil (Bradley Cooper) and Alan (Zach Galifianakis) again in attendance, anything can happen.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: It's been two years since the gang known as the Wolfpack narrowly escaped disaster in Bangkok. Now, Phil (Bradley Cooper), Stu (Ed Helms) and Doug (Justin Bartha) have happy lives at home -- but Alan (Zach Galifianakis) doesn't. Still lacking contentment and a sense of purpose, Alan has gone off his meds and surrendered to his natural impulses. It's up to the other members of the Wolfpack to get him through his personal crisis by embarking on a road trip to the place it all began: Las Vegas.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: Two years after the disastrous events in Las Vegas, it is now Stu's (Ed Helms) turn to walk down the aisle. Since his bride is from Thailand, Stu decides to hold the wedding there. Desperately hoping to avoid the mayhem of Doug's (Justin Bartha) bachelor party, Stu chooses what he thinks will be a safe option: an alcohol-free, prewedding brunch. programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: It's been two years since the gang known as the Wolfpack narrowly escaped disaster in Bangkok. Now, Phil (Bradley Cooper), Stu (Ed Helms) and Doug (Justin Bartha) have happy lives at home -- but Alan (Zach Galifianakis) doesn't. Still lacking contentment and a sense of purpose, Alan has gone off his meds and surrendered to his natural impulses. It's up to the other members of the Wolfpack to get him through his personal crisis by embarking on a road trip to the place it all began: Las Vegas.

programme.title: Dirty Grandpa
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Jason Kelly is one week away from marrying his boss's controlling daughter, putting him on the fast track for a partnership at his firm. Tricked by his grandfather Dick, Jason finds himself driving the foulmouthed old man to Daytona Beach, Fla., for a wild spring break that includes frat parties, bar fights and a night of karaoke. While Jason worries about the upcoming wedding, Dick tries to show his grandson how to live life to the fullest.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer rescues a bar in Boca Raton, FL whose owner is failing to achieve the same success he found in the music industry as he is in the bar.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer heads to Port St. Lucie, FL to help two partners save their failing bar, regain their confidence, and learn how to properly run a business.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Bar expert Jon Taffer sets off to help Bill, the owner of The Chicken Bone, avoid financial ruin; Bill, a former customer who took over the Bone, learned the hard way that running a bar is much tougher than it looks.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon must fix a rat-infested bar owned by two fraternity brothers in Fells Point, Md., that is about to collapse.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A bar with a golf theme needs major help to fix its horrendous sanitary conditions.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Taffer tries to save a marriage and a bar by splitting one bar into two.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: A Portland bar with a stubborn chef and an owner ready to sever ties with his over-bearing step-daughter and business partner who berates her staff.

programme.title: Bar Rescue
programme.desc: Jon Taffer attempts to rescue a bar in Kingwood, Texas, whose owners have neglected both the business and the staff over the last several years.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: When college senior Anastasia Steele (Dakota Johnson) steps in for her sick roommate to interview prominent businessman Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan) for their campus paper, little does she realize the path her life will take. Christian, as enigmatic as he is rich and powerful, finds himself strangely drawn to Ana, and she to him. Though sexually inexperienced, Ana plunges headlong into an affair -- and learns that Christian's true sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: When a wounded Christian Grey tries to entice a cautious Anastasia Steele back into his life, she demands a new arrangement before she will give him another chance. As the two begin to build trust and find stability, shadowy figures from Christian's past start to circle them, determined to destroy their hopes for a future together.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing they've left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. Just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardize their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When a man (Christopher Lloyd) claiming to be Fester, the missing brother of Gomez Addams (Raul Julia), arrives at the Addams' home, the family is thrilled. However, Morticia (Anjelica Huston) begins to suspect the man is a fraud, since he cannot recall details of Fester's life. With the help of lawyer Tully Alford (Dan Hedaya), Fester manages to get the Addams clan evicted from their home. Gomez realizes the two men are conspiring to swindle the Addams fortune and that he must challenge Fester.

programme.title: Addams Family Values
programme.desc: The members of the odd Addams Family are up to more macabre antics in this sequel. This time around, Gomez Addams (Raul Julia) and his wife, Morticia (Anjelica Huston), are celebrating the arrival of a baby boy. But siblings Wednesday (Christina Ricci) and Pugsley (Jimmy Workman) are none too happy about the new addition, and try their best to eliminate the infant. When nanny Debbie Jelinsky (Joan Cusack) appears to keep the kids in line, her presence leads to an unexpected treacherous twist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When a man (Christopher Lloyd) claiming to be Fester, the missing brother of Gomez Addams (Raul Julia), arrives at the Addams' home, the family is thrilled. programme.desc: The members of the odd Addams Family are up to more macabre antics in this sequel. This time around, Gomez Addams (Raul Julia) and his wife, Morticia (Anjelica Huston), are celebrating the arrival of a baby boy. But siblings Wednesday (Christina Ricci) and Pugsley (Jimmy Workman) are none too happy about the new addition, and try their best to eliminate the infant. When nanny Debbie Jelinsky (Joan Cusack) appears to keep the kids in line, her presence leads to an unexpected treacherous twist.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: When college senior Anastasia Steele (Dakota Johnson) steps in for her sick roommate to interview prominent businessman Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan) for their campus paper, little does she realize the path her life will take. Christian, as enigmatic as he is rich and powerful, finds himself strangely drawn to Ana, and she to him. Though sexually inexperienced, Ana plunges headlong into an affair -- and learns that Christian's true sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Live: What Would You Do?
programme.desc: Using hidden cameras, host John Quiñones observes and comments on how ordinary people behave when they are confronted with dilemmas that require them either to take action or to walk by and mind their own business. Various scenarios are created that force people to make split-second -- and often surprising -- decisions, and variations of the situation (such as changing the genders, races or clothing of the people involved) are often featured to see if different reactions are elicited. Examples of situations on the show include a waitress being harassed by her boss, and a drunken valet trying to park cars.

programme.title: I Am Woman
programme.desc: The story of Helen Reddy, who in 1966 landed in NYC with her three-year-old daughter, a suitcase and $230 in her pocket. Within five years she was one of the biggest superstars of her time, and an icon of the 1970s feminist movement.

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: Ashton Kutcher is Steve Jobs, the iconic Apple innovator and groundbreaking entrepreneur. This inspiring and entertaining film chronicles Jobs early days as a college dropout, to his rise as the co-founder of Apple Computer Inc.

programme.title: Live: The Paul Finebaum Show
programme.desc: Veteran writer, reporter and radio personality Paul Finebaum built a legion of loyal sports fans as the "Voice of the SEC" during 20 years hosting his Birmingham, Ala.-based radio talk show. When ESPN launched the SEC Network in 2014, it was only natural that Finebaum became its first on-air hire, bringing his radio show -- and those passionate followers -- with him. Now originating from one of the SEC Network studios in Charlotte, N.C., the show is a forum for lively discussion and debate of all things SEC and across the spectrum of college sports, with Finebaum playing the role of both moderator and provocateur. The show airs weekday afternoons throughout the year on SEC Network.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Evolving from single-celled yellow organisms at the dawn of time, Minions live to serve, but find themselves working for a continual series of unsuccessful masters, from T. Rex to Napoleon. Without a master to grovel for, the Minions fall into a deep depression. But one minion, Kevin, has a plan; accompanied by his pals Stuart and Bob, Kevin sets forth to find a new evil boss for his brethren to follow. Their search leads them to Scarlet Overkill, the world's first-ever super-villainess.

programme.title: The LEGO Movie
programme.desc: An ordinary LEGO figurine Emmet who always follows the rules, is mistakenly identified as an extraordinary being and the key to saving the world. He finds himself drafted into a fellowship of strangers who are on a mission to stop an evil tyrant's plans to conquer the world. Unfortunately for Emmet, he is hopelessly and hilariously unprepared for such a task, but he'll give it his all nonetheless.

programme.title: Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: "It's Mopar or No Car" for Mark Worman and his Graveyard Carz ghouls. They're game for any repair or restoration job, as long as it's in the Mopar mold -- a Chrysler muscle car from the late 1960s or early '70s. The series follows the progress to get the racing classics -- some left for dead in a scrap heap -- across the proverbial finish line, which to muscle car specialist Worman means nothing less than perfect restorations. After all, too much beauty exists in quality Detroit automobiles to let them go to rust.

programme.title: Captain America: The First Avenger

programme.desc: As Death Eaters wreak havoc in both Muggle and Wizard worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven for students. Though Harry suspects there are new dangers lurking within the castle walls, Dumbledore is more intent than ever on preparing the young wizard for the final battle with Voldemort. Teenage hormones run rampant through Hogwarts, presenting a different sort of danger. Love may be in the air, but tragedy looms and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

programme.title: The Craft: Legacy
programme.desc: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Found video footage tells the tale of three film students (Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard, Michael C. Williams) who've traveled to a small town to collect documentary footage about the Blair Witch, a legendary local murderer. Over the course of several days, the students interview townspeople and gather clues to support the tale's veracity. But the project takes a frightening turn when the students lose their way in the woods and begin hearing horrific noises.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
programme.desc: Christine Brown has a loving boyfriend and a good job at a Los Angeles bank. Her heavenly life becomes hellish when, in an effort to impress her boss, she denies an old woman's request for an extension on her home loan. In retaliation, the crone places a curse on Christine, threatening her soul with eternal damnation. Christine seeks a psychic's help to break the curse, but the price to save her soul may be more than she can pay.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A garrulous man, bet half a million dollars that he can't keep silent for one year, goes to bizarre lengths to win the wager.

programme.title: Learn More About Medicare Advantage Plans from Humana
programme.desc: Are you making the most of your Medicare coverage? In this program you will learn about the variety of Humana Medicare plans designed to fit your needs, your lifestyle, and your budget.

programme.title: NEW! Shark PowerDetect with DuoClean Detect Technology
programme.desc: Meet the new Shark PowerDetect Upright Vacuum with features like DuoClean Detect Technology, self-cleaning brush roll and odor neutralizing and you will be cleaning faster, smarter and better!

programme.title: Ready for a safer shower? Enjoy a one-day bath remodel with Jacuzzi.
programme.desc: Trusted brand Jacuzzi Bath Remodel and interior designer Christina Hall share their secrets on how you can easily and affordably transform your bathroom into a gorgeous custom, safe, stylish space in 1 day! Call for a FREE quote & installation.

programme.title: DraftKings Sportsbook Report
programme.desc: DraftKings Sportsbook, a top-rated sportsbook app!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An airline official tests his theory that a newly arrived but totally empty plane is imaginary-with startling results.

programme.title: The Outfit
programme.desc: Leonard is an English tailor who makes suits on London's Savile Row. He must outsmart a group of criminals to survive a fateful night.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. But her teaching is deficient and her methods, cruel, so Harry prepares a group of students to defend the school against a rising tide of evil.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: As Death Eaters wreak havoc in both Muggle and Wizard worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven for students. Though Harry suspects there are new dangers lurking within the castle walls, Dumbledore is more intent than ever on preparing the young wizard for the final battle with Voldemort. Teenage hormones run rampant through Hogwarts, presenting a different sort of danger. Love may be in the air, but tragedy looms and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

programme.title: Avengers: Infinity War
programme.desc: Iron Man, Thor, the Hulk and the rest of the Avengers unite to battle their most powerful enemy yet -- the evil Thanos. On a mission to collect all six Infinity Stones, Thanos plans to use the artifacts to inflict his twisted will on reality. The fate of the planet and existence itself has never been more uncertain as everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Photographer Adam Stanheight (Leigh Whannell) and oncologist Lawrence Gordon (Cary Elwes) regain consciousness while chained to pipes at either end of a filthy bathroom. As the two men realize they've been trapped by a sadistic serial killer nicknamed "Jigsaw" and must complete his perverse puzzle to live, flashbacks relate the fates of his previous victims. Meanwhile, Dr. Gordon's wife (Monica Potter) and young daughter (Makenzie Vega) are forced to watch his torture via closed-circuit video.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: The Outfit
programme.desc: Leonard is an English tailor who makes suits on London's Savile Row. He must outsmart a group of criminals to survive a fateful night.

programme.title: The Northman
programme.desc: Prince Amleth is on the verge of becoming a man when his father is brutally murdered by his uncle, who kidnaps the boy's mother. Two decades later, Amleth is now a Viking who raids Slavic villages. He soon meets a seeress who reminds him of his vow -- save his mother, kill his uncle, avenge his father.

programme.title: Poltergeist III
programme.desc: Psychically attuned youngster Carol Anne (Heather O'Rourke) is sent to live in Chicago with her Uncle Bruce (Tom Skerritt) and Aunt Pat (Nancy Allen). But that doesn't mean that she's escaped the apparitions that have haunted her in the past. When she starts experiencing terrifying visions, her school psychologist believes that they're figments of her imagination. But this becomes hard to believe when ghostly foes start inhabiting the mirrors in her relatives' high-rise apartment.

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: The Freelings have escaped their haunted house, which is now being studied by paranormal investigators, including shaman Taylor (Will Sampson). When Taylor realizes that the Beast, masquerading as the Rev. Kane (Julian Beck), knows where young Carol Anne Freeling (Heather O'Rourke) now lives, he goes to warn the family that their daughter is in danger again. To protect Carol, her father, Steve (Craig T. Nelson), and the rest of the family must plot to take down the Beast.

programme.title: Winchester
programme.desc: The most haunted house in the world sits on an isolated stretch of land that's 50 miles outside of San Francisco. Built by Sarah Winchester, heiress to the Winchester fortune, it stands seven stories tall and contains hundreds of rooms. To an outsider, it looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah's actually building a prison, an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts -- and the most terrifying among them have a score to settle with the Winchesters.

programme.title: I, Frankenstein
programme.desc: Two centuries after Dr. Frankenstein assembles and reanimates his creature, Adam (Aaron Eckhart) is still living. He becomes embroiled in a war between two immortal races: gargoyles, the traditional protectors of mankind, and evil demons. Since Adam is neither human nor demon, gargoyle Queen Leonore (Miranda Otto) and demon Prince Naberius (Bill Nighy) each want him for their own purposes. It is up to Adam to discover his inner humanity and the reason for his continued existence.

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Photographer Adam Stanheight (Leigh Whannell) and oncologist Lawrence Gordon (Cary Elwes) regain consciousness while chained to pipes at either end of a filthy bathroom. As the two men realize they've been trapped by a sadistic serial killer nicknamed "Jigsaw" and must complete his perverse puzzle to live, flashbacks relate the fates of his previous victims. Meanwhile, Dr. Gordon's wife (Monica Potter) and young daughter (Makenzie Vega) are forced to watch his torture via closed-circuit video.

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: On the hunt for the twisted vigilante and serial killer Jigsaw, Detective Eric Matthews and his team must apprehend the elusive murderer to rescue eight people trapped in an abandoned house, before they succumb to his torturous and murderous games. One twist to this task is that Matthews' own son, Daniel, is among the eight people Jigsaw has chosen to test for their lack of morality. With nerve gas pumping through the house, every second counts.

programme.title: Saw III
programme.desc: Dr. Lynn Denlon (Bahar Soomekh) becomes a pawn in the Jigsaw Killer's (Tobin Bell) latest gory game. Kidnapped and taken to an abandoned warehouse, she finds Jigsaw bedridden and dying. Her task is to keep the maniac alive long enough for Jeff (Angus Macfadyen), a fellow victim, to complete his own task. Each is unaware that Jigsaw has much bigger -- and deadlier -- plans in store.

programme.title: Winchester
programme.desc: The most haunted house in the world sits on an isolated stretch of land that's 50 miles outside of San Francisco. Built by Sarah Winchester, heiress to the Winchester fortune, it stands seven stories tall and contains hundreds of rooms. To an outsider, it looks like a monstrous monument to a disturbed woman's madness. But Sarah's actually building a prison, an asylum for hundreds of vengeful ghosts -- and the most terrifying among them have a score to settle with the Winchesters.

programme.title: Father of the Bride Part II
programme.desc: Just when George Banks (Steve Martin) has gotten used to his daughter, Annie (Kimberly Williams), being married, she announces that she's pregnant, making him an impending grandfather. Shaken by nearing this new milestone in his life, George soon has to process even more surprising news -- his wife, Nina (Diane Keaton), is pregnant too. Reeling from these revelations, George gets help from the eccentric Franck (Martin Short), who, conveniently, has moved from planning weddings to baby showers.

Intrigued by Hal's shallowness, Robbins hypnotizes him into seeing the beauty that exists even in the least physically appealing women.

programme.desc: New York lawyer Vinny has never won a case. When his teenage cousin Bill and his friend Stan are accused of murder in a backwater Alabama town, it's up to the nervous Vinny to save him from jail, even though he's only ever tried personal injury cases before, and none of them successfully.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: FBI Special Agent Sarah Ashburn (Sandra Bullock) is a methodical investigator with a long-standing reputation for excellence -- and arrogance. In contrast, foul-mouthed, hot-tempered detective Shannon Mullins (Melissa McCarthy) goes with her gut instincts and street smarts to remove criminals from the streets of Boston. Sparks fly when these polar opposites have to work together to capture a drug lord, but in the process, they become the last thing anyone expected -- buddies.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) are workers who would like nothing better than to grind their oppressive employers into the dirt. Quitting their jobs is not an option, so -- fueled by alcohol and dubious advice from a criminal (Jamie Foxx) -- the men devise a complex and seemingly foolproof plan to permanently rid themselves of their terrible bosses. The problem is, any plan is only as clever as the brains behind it.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: Tired of always answering to others, Nick (Jason Bateman), Dale (Charlie Day) and Kurt (Jason Sudeikis) go into business for themselves. After demonstrating the prototype for an invention called the Shower Buddy, the guys attract the attention of Rex Hanson and his father, Bert. Bert invests in the trio's product, then cancels the order and steals their idea. Now heavily in debt and with no legal recourse, Nick, Dale and Kurt decide to kidnap Rex and use the ransom money to pay off their loans.

programme.title: Breaker! Breaker!
programme.desc: Truck driver searches for his brother, who has disappeared in a town run by a corrupt judge.

programme.title: Son of a Gun
programme.desc: JR busts out of prison with Brendan Lynch, Australia's most notorious criminal, and joins Lynch's gang for a gold heist that soon pits the two men against one another.

programme.title: London Heist
programme.desc: After Jack Cregan (Craig Fairbrass - Rise of the Footsoldier) and his men rob a London money depot, their haul is stolen from them and Cregan's father is murdered. Cregan thinks he's found the killer, but the truth is never simple.

programme.title: Conan The Barbarian
programme.desc: The most legendary Barbarian of all time is back. A quest that begins as a personal vendetta for the fierce Cimmerian warrior soon turns into an epic battle against hulking rivals, horrific monsters, and impossible odds, as Conan realizes he is the only hope of saving the great nations of Hyboria.

programme.title: Programming will resume shortly
programme.desc: We're catching up on our beauty sleep! Stay tuned for more priceless entertainment curated by Rakuten TV.

programme.title: The Legend Of Hercules
programme.desc: In the epic origin story the legend of Hercules, a half-god, half-man blessed with extraordinary streng. Betrayed by his stepfather, the king, and exiled and sold into slavery because of a forbidden love, Hercules must use his formidable powers.

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: They chose the worst man for the job. They expected him to fail, but he wasn't about to let a witness be murdered on his watch. Personal demons put Jack a New York City cop at rock bottom.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Compromised by his affair with the first lady, a veteran secret service agent is framed as a potential presidential assassin and must rely on a hostile former protégé to flush out the real culprit.

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as the leader of a group of German officers who hatched a plot to assassinate Hitler. The operation was code-named "Valkyrie," for the emergency plan that was meant to be used in case of a revolt against the Nazi government.

programme.title: Snitch
programme.desc: In the fast-paced action thriller SNITCH, Dwayne Johnson stars as a father whose teenage son is wrongly accused of a drug distribution crime and is looking at a mandatory minimum prison sentence of 10 years.

programme.title: Supercell
programme.desc: Aspiring storm-chaser William is determined to continue his father's legacy by chasing the most dangerous supercell tornado ever seen.

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: An innocent discovery of a well-preserved mummified Emperor from 200 B.C. China unearths a two thousand-year-old nightmare, a secret that should have remained buried.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops, a rookie and a grizzled vet, pursue an accomplished bank robber.

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: The story begins with highly decorated Detectives Turk and Rooster of the NYPD facing a retirement which neither of them are ready for. Before they can hang up their badges, they are called to investigate the murder of a notorious pimp, who appears to have ties to a case they solved years before.

programme.title: Final Kill
programme.desc: An aging protection specialist takes on one last job before retirement, protecting a couple who stole eight million dollars from a ruthless crime family.

programme.title: Wish Upon
programme.desc: When Clare's dad gifts her an old music box with an inscription that promises to grant the owner's wishes, she thinks there is nothing to lose. Clare makes her first wish and, to her surprise, it comes true. Before long, she finally has it all: money, popularity and her dream boy.

programme.title: Monsters and Men
programme.desc: When young father Manny witnesses the police shooting of an unarmed black man, the tight-knit community of Bed-Stuy is pushed to the brink in Reinaldo.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is literally money and aging stops at 25, the only way to stay alive is to earn, steal, or inherit more time.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: Set in New Orleans, this is the story of a mysterious man, Nick Easter. Nick gets himself not only on the jury of a landmark case against a gun manufacturer, but as the foreman, in an attempt to influence the other jury members to vote a certain way.

programme.title: The Hustle
programme.desc: Josephine Chesterfield (Anne Hathaway) is a glamorous, seductive Brit with a penchant for defrauding gullible wealthy men. Into her well-ordered world bursts Penny Rust (Rebel Wilson), an Aussie who is as free-form and fun-loving as Josephine is calculated and cunning.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: The far-flung members of the Rodriguez family converge at their parents' home to face what may be their last Christmas together in this heart-warming holiday comedy.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

programme.title: Salt and fire
programme.desc: A scientist blames the head of a large company for an ecological disaster in South America. But when a volcano begins to show signs of erupting, they must unite to avoid a disaster.

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: Calvin (Ice Cube) is a would-be entrepreneur with big plans...and running his family's barbershop isn't one of them. But when he impulsively sells the shop to a shady loan shark, he soon realizes just how important the neighborhood parlor is to him... and just how far he'll go to get it back!

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: A Haunted House
programme.desc: In this outrageous spoof of "found footage" movies, young couple Malcolm (Marlon Wayans) and Kisha (Essence Atkins) have just moved into their dream house. As they settle in, they quickly find they're not alone. But it's not the house that's haunted, it's Malcolm's girlfriend!

programme.title: Cuddle on the Couch
programme.desc: 4 hours of 90s love. What more could you ask for? We all need a cuddle on the couch every now and again.

programme.title: Mellow Moments! Mellow Moments!
programme.desc: Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.

programme.title: You Know The Tune But Who Sang It? You Know The Tune But Who Sang It?
programme.desc: All famous, sing-a-long hit songs but who the hell sang them? We guarantee you won't know most of these artists by name but you'll love their songs!

programme.title: Regret That Duet? 1990-1999 Regret That Duet? 1990-1999
programme.desc: 11 collaborations of the 90s that maybe they should have thought twice about? Ok some were for charity - but I mean....

programme.title: All Loved Up! Top 30 All Loved Up! Top 30
programme.desc: Pat Sharp with 30 massive love songs of the 90s - including a bucket load of million sellers and the odd surprise!

programme.title: 50 Girls In Love
programme.desc: Ladies in love and heartbroken heroines. These are the greatest stars of the decade, all pouring their hearts out for your attention.

programme.title: The Weekend Pop Party! The Weekend Pop Party!
programme.desc: The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!

programme.title: Jenny Powell: Such A Good Feeling! Jenny Powell: Such A Good Feeling!
programme.desc: Dancing through history - one anthem at a time! From late 80s optimism to mid 90s euphoria, it's where house, rave & eurodance all started. Hands in the air people!

programme.title: The Weekend Pop Party! The Weekend Pop Party!
programme.desc: The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!

programme.title: NOW Disney Classics! 1991-1999 NOW Disney Classics! 1991-1999

programme.desc: It's where Harry Meets Sally & Robin Hood shares TV time with Godzilla, Batman & Austin Powers! Time to belt out some the biggest tunes ever seen in the movies.

programme.title: The Weekend Pop Party! The Weekend Pop Party!
programme.desc: The biggest party songs & sing-out-loud anthems from the 90s & 00s to provide the perfect soundtrack to your weekend!

programme.title: 30 Big Selling Movie Songs of 90s! 30 Big Selling Movie Songs of 90s!

programme.title: S3 E35 Nottingham to Lancashire
programme.desc: Writer Ian has £300k to spend on a country home in Lancashire with some requests. Ian suffered nerve damage to his leg and uses sticks or a wheelchair to get about, so Catherine looks for a single-story house with a level and easy-access garden.

programme.title: The Ruthless Four

programme.desc: A Bullet for the General - A band of Mexican gun-runners employed by a revolutionary general accept an American into their gang, unaware of his intentions.

programme.title: $100,000 for a Killing
programme.desc: $100,000 for a Killing - Johnny Forest, bounty hunter, attempts to carry out his mother's dying wish that he bring in his outlaw brother, Clint, alive.

programme.title: Sugar Colt
programme.desc: In order to avenge a friend and to fulfill his last wish, Rocco has to find out what happened to an army corps that has mysteriously disappeared. He therefore puts on the disguise of a doctor and starts investigating in a somewhat uncomfortable town.

programme.title: Only the Valiant
programme.desc: Capt. Richard Lance is unjustly held responsible, by his men and girlfriend, for an Indian massacre death of beloved Lt. Holloway. Holloway is killed while escorting a dangerous Indian chief to another fort's prison. The chief escapes. Knowing their fort is in danger of Indian attack, Lance takes a small group of army misfits to an abandoned nearby army fort to defend a mountain pass against the oncoming Indian assault. Their mission is to stall for time until reinforcements from another fort arrive. The men in this small group of malcontents, deserters, psychopaths and cowards all hate Capt. Lance and wish him dead. Much to their chagrin, the men recognize that Lance's survival instincts, military knowledge and leadership are the only chance the group has of staying alive.

programme.title: Raise Your Hands, Dead Man, You're Under Arrest
programme.desc: The sole survivor, named Sando Kid (Peter Lee Lawrence), of a massacre in the North seeks revenge. After suffering the atrocity, the Kid executes a solo revenge, razes, beats and kills everyone involved in the massacre.

programme.title: Gun Duel in Durango
programme.desc: Ex-outlaw Will Sabre wants an honest life under the alias Dan Tomlinson but his old gang, under new leader Dunsten, wants him back for a new string of armed robberies.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman
programme.desc: Old Western Movie starring John Wayne: Angel and the Badman - Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Gunman of One Hundred Crosses
programme.desc: An Irishman is killed in the wild West. His son Jimmy goes out searching for the killers of his father, but is soon ambushed by two highwaymen, and killed, too.

programme.title: Crazy Westerners

programme.title: Iron Brothers
programme.desc: Fur trappers Abel and Henry Iron struggle in the declining fur trade in the Rocky Mountains. After an accidental death during an encounter with Shoshone Indians, the brothers find themselves fleeing into the wilderness. As they evade pursuing warriors, Abel and Henry must rely on their bond of brotherhood to survive and escape their fate.

programme.desc: A voice trumpet rises and teaches the Teletubbies a nursery rhyme. Then they watch Becky go for a ride on a Tram. Po rides her scooter too fast and knocks the other Tubbies over.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number three. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa go for a walk. They count three trees and three flowers and Po follows behind counting too.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are asleep when a voice trumpet appears singing the rhyme 'Frére Jacques'. The Teletubbies laugh and call "Again, again!"
