programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children making Christmas cards. Laa-Laa's present is some lovely decorations. When Noo-Noo tidies them up they tickle his throat, so he throws them out to decorate Home Hill.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Two children are making Christmas crackers for each other. Dipsy is very pleased to find his present is a cracker. He looks for someone to pull the cracker. It makes a lovely pink bang and the Teletubbies laugh when they fall over.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.desc: Alex Pascall and some children sing to their dolls to rock them to sleep. Laa-Laa wants to sing a lovely song, but Tinky Winky is crunching his Tubby Toast too loudly!

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, John's girlfriend. Though Lori's displeasure is exacerbated by the pair's constant consumption of beer and weed, she's not the one who's most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of John's boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistler's Mother' painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Rumours
programme.desc: Leaders of the world's wealthiest democracies become spectacles of incompetence, contending with increasingly surreal obstacles as night falls in the misty woods and they realise they are suddenly alone.

programme.title: Heaven Can Wait
programme.desc: An American footballer is given the body of a wealthy industrialist after an inept angel prematurely claims his life.

programme.title: Kingpin
programme.desc: An ex-professional bowler and his talented Amish protégé hustle their way across the country to a big-money tournament.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he won't let her go that easily.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A middle-class snob on the eve of retirement takes refuge with her bohemian sister after she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Lake George
programme.desc: Don is strong-armed by mobsters to execute a hit on Phyllis, but instead the two hatch a plan to steal money from the people who want her dead.

programme.title: The Stranger in My Home
programme.desc: Ali meets a mysterious man who claims to be the father of her teenage daughter, Katie. What begins as an unsettling encounter soon spirals into a nightmare of long-buried secrets, lies and obsession.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.title: It Feeds
programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: Nick Morton is a soldier of fortune who plunders ancient sites for timeless artifacts and sells them to the highest bidder. When Nick and his partner come under attack in the Middle East, the ensuing battle accidentally unearths Ahmanet, a betrayed Egyptian princess who was entombed under the desert for thousands of years. With her powers constantly evolving, Morton must now stop the resurrected monster as she embarks on a furious rampage through the streets of London.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Forced back into the field after a family tragedy, special agent Tom Brandis leads a new task force investigating a string of robberies.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom's family prepares for an emotional court date; Robbie faces a dilemma; Maeve makes a crucial decision that might change everything.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: As Cliff and Robbie look for a buyer, Aleah and Lizzie question Peaches' former co-workers; Tom and Grasso pursue a lead.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: Tom questions the loyalty of his taskforce; Perry probes his own gang for answers and uncovers a shocking truth.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: With help from an eyewitness, Tom and his team inch closer to breaking the case; Perry pays Maeve a visit, while Robbie puts his plan in motion; later, Tom follows a lead that takes him down a dangerous path.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: When Superman gets drawn into conflicts at home and abroad, his actions are questioned, giving tech billionaire Lex Luthor the opportunity to get the Man of Steel out of the way for good. Will intrepid reporter Lois Lane and Superman's four-legged companion, Krypto, be able to help him before it's too late?

programme.title: Bring Her Back
programme.desc: A brother and sister uncover a terrifying ritual at the secluded home of their new foster mother.

programme.title: Interview With the Vampire
programme.desc: Born as an 18th-century lord, Louis is now a bicentennial vampire, telling his story to an eager biographer. Suicidal after the death of his family, he meets Lestat, a vampire who persuades him to choose immortality over death and become his companion. Eventually, gentle Louis resolves to leave his violent maker, but Lestat guilts him into staying by turning a young girl -- whose addition to the "family" breeds even more conflict.

programme.title: Opus
programme.desc: A journalist is invited to the remote compound of a legendary pop star who mysteriously disappeared 30 years ago. Surrounded by the star's cult of sycophants, she gets caught in the middle of his twisted plan.

programme.title: In Time
programme.desc: In a future where time is money and the wealthy can live forever, Will Salas (Justin Timberlake) is a poor man who rarely has more than a day's worth of life on his time clock. When he saves Henry Hamilton (Matt Bomer) from time thieves, Will receives the gift of a century. However, such a large transaction attracts the attention of the authorities, and when Will is falsely accused of murder, he must go on the run, taking the daughter (Amanda Seyfried) of an incredibly wealthy man with him.

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: The true story of the Von Erich brothers, who, through tragedy and triumph, under the shadow of their domineering father and coach, seek epic immortality on the biggest stage in sports.

programme.title: Friendship
programme.desc: A suburban dad falls hard for his new neighbor.

programme.title: This Means War
programme.desc: CIA operatives FDR Foster (Chris Pine) and Tuck (Tom Hardy) are inseparable best friends and partners. Together, their good looks, covert abilities and combat skills rank them among the CIA's elite, but their longstanding personal and professional bond is put to the test when they meet Lauren (Reese Witherspoon). FDR and Tuck both fall hard for the beautiful blonde, turning their deadly skills and an array of high-tech gadgetry against each other in an all-out battle for her love.

programme.title: Green Lantern
programme.desc: Sworn to preserve intergalactic order, the Green Lantern Corps has existed for centuries. Its newest recruit, Hal Jordan, is the first human to join the ranks. The Green Lanterns have little regard for humans, who have thus far been unable to harness the powers of the ring each member wears. But Jordan, a gifted and cocky test pilot, may be the corps' only hope when a new enemy called Parallax threatens the universal balance of power.

programme.title: An Intimate Evening With Adam Pally
programme.desc: Equal parts stand-up, documentary and rock concert, Adam Pally plays with the truth and his guitar in a one-time-only performance.

programme.title: Mickey 17
programme.desc: A disposable employee is sent on a human expedition to colonize the ice world Niflheim. After one iteration dies, a new body is regenerated with most of his memories intact.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Hoping to expose corruption, radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy company's annual gala in a high-rise building. Their cause soon gets hijacked by an extremist within their ranks who's ready to kill everyone. It's now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Death of a Unicorn
programme.desc: A weekend retreat has deadly consequences when a father and daughter accidentally hit and kill a unicorn while en route to find his billionaire boss, who seeks to exploit the creature's miraculous curative properties.

programme.title: Freaky Tales
programme.desc: An NBA star, a corrupt cop, a female rap duo, teenage punks, neo-Nazis and a debt collector embark on a collision course in 1987 Oakland, Calif.

programme.title: Evil Dead 2
programme.desc: The second of three films in the Evil Dead series is part horror, part comedy, with Ash Williams (Bruce Campbell) once again battling horrifying demons at a secluded cabin in the woods. After discovering an audiotape left by a college professor that contains voices reading from the Book of the Dead, Ash's girlfriend Linda (Denise Bixler) becomes possessed by evil spirits that are awakened by the voices on the tape. Ash soon discovers there is no escaping the woods.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: A Different Man
programme.desc: Aspiring actor Edward undergoes a radical medical procedure to drastically transform his appearance. But his new dream face turns into a nightmare as he becomes obsessed with reclaiming what he lost.

programme.title: The Devil Is Busy
programme.desc: A daylong journey with Tracii, the determined head of security at a women's healthcare clinic in Atlanta, Georgia as she works to ensure the safety of women seeking abortions in the face of new restrictions and persistent protests. Following the routines of the staff who continue to provide a range of medical services, including preventive screenings, checkups, and reproductive healthcare, in an environment where clinics often face daily threats of danger.

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: The discovery of a clue to mankind's origins on Earth leads a team of explorers to the darkest parts of the universe. Two brilliant young scientists lead the expedition. Shaw (Noomi Rapace) hopes that they will meet a race of benevolent, godlike beings who will in some way verify her religious beliefs, while Holloway (Logan Marshall-Green) is out to debunk any spiritual notions. However, neither the scientists nor their shipmates are prepared for the unimaginable terrors that await them.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: Bound for a remote planet on the far side of the galaxy, members (Katherine Waterston, Billy Crudup) of the colony ship Covenant discover what they think to be an uncharted paradise. While there, they meet David (Michael Fassbender), the synthetic survivor of the doomed Prometheus expedition. The mysterious world soon turns dark and dangerous when a hostile alien life-form forces the crew into a deadly fight for survival.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: Godzilla and the almighty Kong face a colossal threat hidden deep within the planet, challenging their very existence and the survival of the human race.

programme.title: The Chair Company
programme.desc: After an embarrassing incident at work, William Ronald Trosper finds himself investigating a far-reaching conspiracy.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Practical Magic
programme.desc: Sally and Gillian Owens, born into a magical family, have mostly avoided witchcraft themselves. But when Gillian's vicious boyfriend, Jimmy Angelov, dies unexpectedly, the Owens sisters give themselves a crash course in hard magic. With policeman Gary Hallet growing suspicious, the girls struggle to resurrect Angelov -- and unwittingly inject his corpse with an evil spirit that threatens to end their family line.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: The Chair Company
programme.desc: After an embarrassing incident at work, William Ronald Trosper finds himself investigating a far-reaching conspiracy.

programme.title: Love & Other Drugs
programme.desc: Handsome pharmaceutical salesman Jamie Randall (Jake Gyllenhaal) always has good luck with women. A chance encounter with Maggie Murdock (Anne Hathaway), a free-spirited Parkinson's patient, leads to a sexual relationship. As Jamie and Maggie become closer, each must question if a serious commitment is in their future.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: The Chair Company
programme.desc: After an embarrassing incident at work, William Ronald Trosper finds himself investigating a far-reaching conspiracy.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: In an alternate 1985 America, costumed superheroes are part of everyday life. When one of his former comrades is murdered, masked vigilante Rorschach (Jackie Earle Haley) uncovers a plot to kill and discredit all past and present superheroes. As he reconnects with his retired associates, only one of which has true powers, Rorschach glimpses a far-reaching conspiracy involving their shared past and catastrophic consequences for the world's future.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: When a mercenary warrior (Matt Damon) is imprisoned within the Great Wall, he discovers the mystery behind one of the greatest wonders of the world. As wave after wave of marauding beasts besiege the massive structure, his quest for fortune turns into a journey toward heroism as he joins a huge army of elite warriors to confront the unimaginable and seemingly unstoppable force.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Before she is Wonder Woman, she is Diana, princess of the Amazons, trained to be an unconquerable warrior. Raised on a sheltered island paradise, Diana meets an American pilot who tells her about the conflict that's raging in the outside world. Convinced that she can stop the threat, Diana leaves her home for the first time. Fighting alongside men in a war to end all wars, she finally discovers her full powers and true destiny.

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: Diana Prince lives quietly among mortals in the vibrant, sleek 1980s -- an era of excess driven by the pursuit of having it all. Though she's come into her full powers, she maintains a low profile by curating ancient artifacts, and only performing heroic acts incognito. But soon, Diana will have to muster all of her strength, wisdom and courage as she finds herself squaring off against Maxwell Lord and the Cheetah, a villainess who possesses superhuman strength and agility.

programme.title: Daniel
programme.desc: When the coming-of-age adventure collides with an ancient Mayan curse, a boy's search for answers turns into a quest to put things back where they belong before he runs out of time.

programme.title: Red Dawn
programme.desc: In an alternate 1980s, the United States stands alone as communism grows stronger. When Soviet soldiers invade a small Colorado town, brothers Jed (Patrick Swayze) and Matt Eckert (Charlie Sheen) escape with friends to the forest. With their father, Tom (Harry Dean Stanton), a prisoner of the invading army, the children decide to fight against the Soviets. As the country comes under increasing attack, the group teams up with Lt. Col. Andrew Tanner (Powers Boothe) to take back their town.

programme.title: Mechanic: Resurrection
programme.desc: Living under cover in Brazil, master assassin Arthur Bishop (Jason Statham) springs back into action after an old enemy (Sam Hazeldine) kidnaps the woman (Jessica Alba) he loves. To save her life, Bishop must kill an imprisoned African warlord, a human trafficker (Toby Eddington) and an arms dealer (Tommy Lee Jones), all while making the deaths look like accidents. When things don't go exactly as planned, Bishop turns the tables on the people who forced him out of retirement.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Mortal Kombat Annihilation
programme.desc: Every generation, a portal opens up between the Outerworld and Earth. Emperor Shao-Kahn (Brian Thompson), ruler of the mythical Outerworld, pounces the moment the portal reopens and slips through with his mighty warriors, intent on total domination and uniting the two worlds. However, he has only seven days to complete his task. In the meantime, opposition grows and warriors Sonya Blade (Sandra Hess), Jax (Lynn "Red" Williams), Kitana (Talisa Soto) and Liu Kang (Robin Shou) get ready for war.

programme.title: The Chair Company
programme.desc: After an embarrassing incident at work, Ron Trosper tries to solve the problem and finds himself investigating a conspiracy.

programme.title: The Chair Company
programme.desc: After an embarrassing incident at work, William Ronald Trosper finds himself investigating a far-reaching conspiracy.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Hereditary
programme.desc: When the matriarch of the Graham family passes away, her daughter and grandchildren begin to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry, trying to outrun the sinister fate they have inherited.

programme.title: Task
programme.desc: An FBI agent heads a Task Force to put an end to a string of violent robberies led by an unsuspecting family man.

programme.title: Sing Sing
programme.desc: A man is imprisoned at Sing Sing for a crime he didn't commit. When joined by a wary outsider, he finds purpose in staging an original comedy with a theater group of other incarcerated men.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Razorbacks (2-4, 0-2 SEC) host the No. 4 Aggies (6-0, 3-0) for another edition of the Southwest Classic. Texas A&M has won 12 of the last 13 meetings after knocking off Arkansas 21-17 last year. Marcel Reed accounted for all three Aggies TDs.

programme.title: Live: College Football Scoreboard
programme.desc: Presenting up-to-the-minute scores and highlights during the college football season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: Arch Manning leads the No. 21 Longhorns (4-2, 1-1 SEC) into this outing with the Wildcats (2-3, 0-3). Manning threw for 166 yards and a TD when Texas stunned then-No. 6 Oklahoma in the Red River Rivalry on Oct. 11. Texas beat Kentucky 31-14 in 2024.

programme.title: Live: College Football Scoreboard
programme.desc: Presenting up-to-the-minute scores and highlights during the college football season.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Seminoles (3-3, 0-3 ACC) look to end their lengthy conference drought as they visit the Cardinal (2-4, 1-2). Florida State hasn't bested an ACC foe since topping Stanford's rival California 14-9 on Sept. 21, 2024, a run of eight straight losses.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: College Football Final
programme.desc: Once the day's slate of college football games is complete, ESPN recaps the action and discusses its implications on the top 25. Matt Barrie hosts with analysts Joey Galloway and Dan Mullen.

programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Arch Manning leads the No. 21 Longhorns (4-2, 1-1 SEC) into this outing with the Wildcats (2-3, 0-3). Manning threw for 166 yards and a TD when Texas stunned then-No. 6 Oklahoma in the Red River Rivalry on Oct. 11. Texas beat Kentucky 31-14 in 2024.

programme.title: Live: Sunday NFL Countdown
programme.desc: This Sunday pregame staple debuted in 1985 and soon became a signature ESPN series. Host Mike Greenberg introduces the features and directs the storylines associated with the day's games, joined by a roster of analysts highlighted by ex-NFL players, coaches and executives including Tedy Bruschi, Randy Moss, Alex Smith, and Rex Ryan. Adam Schefter deliver breaking news and injury updates, while reporters at game sites set the scenes.

programme.desc: From L&N Federal Credit Union Arena in Louisville, Ky.

programme.desc: Christen Press bids farewell to the Angel City faithful as ACFC (7-11-6) host the Thorns (9-8-7). The 36-year-old Press announced she is retiring after the season. She made 155 appearances for the United States national team and scored 64 goals.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Live: Monday Night Countdown
programme.desc: Previewing the Monday Night Football matchup airing later on ESPN. Host Scott Van Pelt is joined by Ryan Clark, Jason Kelce, Marcus Spears, Adam Schefter and Michelle Beisner-Buck as they analyze every last morsel of information pertaining to Monday night's combatants, plus discuss the latest news that developed out of Sunday's action.

programme.title: Live: Monday Night Kickoff
programme.desc: The legendary Monday Night Football crew of Joe Buck, Troy Aikman, and Lisa Salters preview the upcoming Monday Night Football action.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football No subtitle
programme.desc: The Buccaneers (5-1) and Lions (4-2) clash on Monday Night Football. Tampa Bay beat San Francisco 30-19 in Week 6 behind big-play Baker Mayfield, who tossed two TD passes, one after keeping a drive alive with a 15-yard escape and run on third-and-14.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football No subtitle
programme.desc: The Texans (2-3) visit the Seahawks (4-2). Houston won two straight games before its bye. Seattle moved to 4-2 after a trip to Duval County resulted in a 20-12 victory over Jacksonville on Oct. 12. The Seahawks are 4-1 all-time facing the Texans.
